job_text: ['', 'More about FIG.', 'Helping the “new economy” brands and companies scale successfully (e.g Simple Mills and Stella & Chewy’s), and', "Ability to synthesize data from multiple sources and analyze performance strategically utilizing SQL or similar gap analysis skillsetsExperience visualizing findings with a front-end visualization tool like Tableau, PowerBI, Datorama or DomoStrong Excel skills for data management; familiarity with Excel's Data Analysis ToolPakExcellent written and oral communication skillsA fast learner, highly meticulousExperience / familiarity with syndicated research sources/tools (Gfk, MRI, Simmons, Scarborough, Brandwatch, Nielsen, comScore)Experience / familiarity with digital ad effectiveness researchExperience in SAS, SPSS, R or other advanced analytics software packages a plus but not required\xa00-2 years experience in analytics at a marketing agency, or related field", "FIG is looking for a Data & Research Analyst experience using analytics tools and syndicated research platforms to extract valuable insights from large datasets. You will be tasked with transforming these data sets into compelling and actionable insights. You'll work directly with the analytics team, clients and vendors to implement measurement solutions alongside a team of media planners and strategists. The role is a good fit for an analyst who is curious by nature, looking to put ideas to the test and collaborate across teams to improve the output of the analyses- with high data quality & data management standards.", 'We believe that stories are the best way to convey information and persuade people so we have built our thoroughly modern agency to deliver on this belief. We are Storytellers for the Information Age, on a mission to raise the bar in our industry by improving the quality and effectiveness of the stories told.', 'We create and produce those stories in-house, and we distribute them across all forms of traditional and digital platforms, ensuring that we create natively to the needs of each platform and channel and always with the consumer first in our minds. We have embedded all services into our offering including media planning & buying. We have a full-service production studio. In November 2017, we completed the acquisition of technology agency Hungry.', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills', 'We do two types of work really well:', 'Alignment with agency values:', 'We pride ourselves on being a fully modern, integrated agency and can be more efficient because of the diversity of skills on our team. We believe in a model with fewer, better people.', 'Experience in SAS, SPSS, R or other advanced analytics software packages a plus but not required\xa0', 'Helping established brands renovate and reposition in a vastly changed marketing ecosystem (eg Benjamin Moore, Ketel One)', 'To learn more about FIG, please visit us at figagency.com.', 'Experience / familiarity with syndicated research sources/tools (Gfk, MRI, Simmons, Scarborough, Brandwatch, Nielsen, comScore)', "Strong Excel skills for data management; familiarity with Excel's Data Analysis ToolPak", 'Experience visualizing findings with a front-end visualization tool like Tableau, PowerBI, Datorama or Domo', '0-2 years experience in analytics at a marketing agency, or related field', 'FIG was created to be a smarter, more nimble alternative to the traditional agency model.', 'Helping the “new economy” brands and companies scale successfully (e.g Simple Mills and Stella & Chewy’s), andHelping established brands renovate and reposition in a vastly changed marketing ecosystem (eg Benjamin Moore, Ketel One)', 'Our ambition is to be the lead communications agency for the world’s most ambitious companies.', 'Ability to synthesize data from multiple sources and analyze performance strategically utilizing SQL or similar gap analysis skillsets', "Truth is the most important of our values. Truth\xa0has an edge to it - sometimes it's painful, sometimes it's beautiful.\xa0 Always it's the right thing.\xa0 For our clients, we look for the\xa0truth\xa0behind trends and try to get to the\xa0truth\xa0of a story. The truth is at the heart of everything that we do and how we treat each other, our clients and their audience.\xa0", 'We are Storytellers for the Information Age, on a mission to improve the quality and effectiveness of the stories told in the communications industry. We have a simple philosophy: for success in today’s world, a brand needs One Story and Many Voices. We are looking for someone exceptional to join our team as a Data & Research Analyst.\xa0\xa0', 'Recent accolades: AdAge Agency A List Stand Out Agency 2018 and 2019, INC 5000 (the definitive list of the fastest growing privately held companies in the US), INC Best Places to Work 2019, AdAge Best Places to Work for 3 consecutive years.\xa0', 'A fast learner, highly meticulous', 'Experience / familiarity with digital ad effectiveness research', 'Qualifications:\xa0']

['', 'This position requires a 4-year college/university degree at minimum, with a strong academic background.', 'Job Description', 'This is a full-time salaried position. Salary is commensurate with experience, with a starting range of $40k to $49k per year.', 'Diversity and inclusion are absolutely core to our mission, and we are committed to those values in our hiring process.', 'Job Details', 'For now this position will be remote, for obvious reasons, but you must be currently based in the New York City area and available to work at our office in the DUMBO neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York, when that becomes possible. In addition, this job is likely to eventually require travel to our conferences, which take place around the country.', 'About From Day One', 'Experience', 'Demonstrated experience and skill in managing and analyzing data is a must. This is an ideal position for someone with education or experience in one of the following: advertising and marketing data such as direct marketing; financial data such as analysis and research; or academic equivalents such as survey data, compiling study results, or similar.', 'must be currently based in the New York City area', 'The Role', 'From Day One offers a comprehensive benefits package including health insurance (including medical, dental, and vision coverage), competitive vacation policies including summer and winter breaks, and an employee stock plan.', 'NYC Applicants Only:']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Summary', ' Support Offshore mutual fund business reporting and data management by coordinating with the International sales team, Offshore funds data providers in Europe, and Data Operations to ensure data is captured, loaded, and reported in a timely and accurate fashion.', 'Experience/Skills Required', ' Bachelor’s degree or 2-3 years related experience. Financial services industry experience preferred.  Demonstrated Microsoft Excel skills.  Familiarity with relational databases and business intelligence tools such as Business Objects or Tableau.  Strong communication and customer service capability.  Detailed oriented, possess a high degree of intellectual curiosity, and strong analytical skills.  Ability to take initiative and solve problems independently, developing fully vetted and viable solutions.  Capability to collaborate with others on projects to reach a successful and timely end goal.  Financial services industry experience preferred.', 'Description', ' Detailed oriented, possess a high degree of intellectual curiosity, and strong analytical skills.', ' Participate in new data implementation projects; prepare requirements documentation, coordinate with various groups, testing, and final integration.', ' Data Analyst', ' Financial services industry experience preferred.', ' Develop, design, and distribute sale reporting.', ' Provide analytic insight and research for inquiries from various internal teams across the organization and external clients.', ' Bachelor’s degree or 2-3 years related experience. Lead new product setups and direct product maintenance in the sales tracking system. Gain familiarity with our product suite, naming conventions, attribute standards, and reporting dependencies. Coordinate with multiple departments to ensure the information is always up to date and accurate.  Manage large suite of scheduled reporting via the business intelligence application. This will include, but is not limited to, understanding when data issues require pausing reports, proactively communicating notable data points, verifying all reports successfully distribute as scheduled, handling distribution lists, and addressing inquiries from report recipients about the data they have received.  Provide analytic insight and research for inquiries from various internal teams across the organization and external clients.  Develop, design, and distribute sale reporting.  Participate in development of the enterprise data warehouse as new business is initiated, providing expertise, user testing, and implementation of new dashboards and reporting.  Assume ownership of data work flow and quality assurance. This encompasses the various data sources used to report and analyze corporate results, product setups, data updates.  Participate in new data implementation projects; prepare requirements documentation, coordinate with various groups, testing, and final integration.  Other duties as assigned.', ' Ability to take initiative and solve problems independently, developing fully vetted and viable solutions.', ' Assume ownership of data work flow and quality assurance. This encompasses the various data sources used to report and analyze corporate results, product setups, data updates.', ' Strong communication and customer service capability.', ' Manage large suite of scheduled reporting via the business intelligence application. This will include, but is not limited to, understanding when data issues require pausing reports, proactively communicating notable data points, verifying all reports successfully distribute as scheduled, handling distribution lists, and addressing inquiries from report recipients about the data they have received.', ' Capability to collaborate with others on projects to reach a successful and timely end goal.', ' Lead new product setups and direct product maintenance in the sales tracking system. Gain familiarity with our product suite, naming conventions, attribute standards, and reporting dependencies. Coordinate with multiple departments to ensure the information is always up to date and accurate.', ' Familiarity with relational databases and business intelligence tools such as Business Objects or Tableau.', ' Other duties as assigned.', ' Demonstrated Microsoft Excel skills.']

['', 'Some of the meaningful work you will perform:', 'Showcase your highly analytical skill set with a knack for analysis, math and statistics. job_title: Data Analyst, Digital Campaigns - New York
job_text: ['', ' A  natural problem solver , who is able to work independently. You are energized by the idea of working through ambiguous data to come up with an actionable answer ', ' 3+ years of experience in digital campaign analytics, ideally with a B2B publisher or advertising agency a plus', ' Experience in working with large datasets coming from multiple places', ' Building reports and dashboards to help identify audience consumption and behavioral trends that provide insights into our audience (i.e. ad performance, sponsor content consumption & topic performance, engagement, traffic)', 'Responsibilities Include', ' analytical self-starter', ' Someone who  thrives in a fast-paced, results-oriented work environment and adapts quickly', ' An analytical self-starter who enjoys working with data to translate it into actionable insights, analysis and recommendations for Insider Intelligence and our advertising clients   An  organized and detail-oriented  individual with excellent time management and project management skills   Someone who is  eager to continuously learn . You’re always looking for ways to optimize and can embrace Insider’s mission: get better every day  Someone who  thrives in a fast-paced, results-oriented work environment and adapts quickly  A  natural problem solver , who is able to work independently. You are energized by the idea of working through ambiguous data to come up with an actionable answer ', ' Self-motivated with the ability to multi-task and effectively manage time, as well as adapt to shifting priorities', ' organized and detail-oriented ', ' thrives in a fast-paced, results-oriented work environment', ' Experience working with ESPs is preferred, knowledge of Marketo a plus', ' An analytical self-starter who enjoys working with data to translate it into actionable insights, analysis and recommendations for Insider Intelligence and our advertising clients ', ' 3+ years of experience in digital campaign analytics, ideally with a B2B publisher or advertising agency a plus  Experience interpreting, analyzing, and reporting on data trends, and making strategic and creative recommendations  Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel   Experience working with ESPs is preferred, knowledge of Marketo a plus  Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a proven ability to present analysis and results to a non-technical audience  Self-motivated with the ability to multi-task and effectively manage time, as well as adapt to shifting priorities  Experience in working with large datasets coming from multiple places  A team player with strong project management, prioritization and problem-solving skills', ' Someone who is  eager to continuously learn . You’re always looking for ways to optimize and can embrace Insider’s mission: get better every day', ' Managing weekly and monthly client tracking reports and analyzing campaign effectiveness, while ensuring accurate, clear and timely reporting', ' Experience interpreting, analyzing, and reporting on data trends, and making strategic and creative recommendations', 'The Ideal Candidate Is', ' eager to continuously learn', ' Analyzing data to identify opportunities or inefficiencies, help develop strategies and deliver insights and recommendations to increase media revenue, drive actionable business decisions and optimize campaign performance', ' to join our Sales Operations team focused on supporting the Media Solutions / Advertising portion of our business. ', ' A team player with strong project management, prioritization and problem-solving skills', ' natural problem solver', ' An  organized and detail-oriented  individual with excellent time management and project management skills ', 'Required Experience', ' excellent time management and project management skills', ' Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel ', ' Building target audience segments to execute efficient and effective ad campaigns for revenue generating programs  Managing weekly and monthly client tracking reports and analyzing campaign effectiveness, while ensuring accurate, clear and timely reporting  Track campaign performance against key performance indicators (KPIs), including but not limited to: email open rates, ad impressions, CTRs  Building reports and dashboards to help identify audience consumption and behavioral trends that provide insights into our audience (i.e. ad performance, sponsor content consumption & topic performance, engagement, traffic)  Analyzing data to identify opportunities or inefficiencies, help develop strategies and deliver insights and recommendations to increase media revenue, drive actionable business decisions and optimize campaign performance', ' Building target audience segments to execute efficient and effective ad campaigns for revenue generating programs', 'We’re hiring a ', ' Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a proven ability to present analysis and results to a non-technical audience', ' Track campaign performance against key performance indicators (KPIs), including but not limited to: email open rates, ad impressions, CTRs', ' Data Analyst, Digital Campaigns']

Strong verbal and written communication skills. Experience with cross-functional teams. Demonstrated professional knowledge of call center operations, metrics, performance triggers, and workforce management. Experience using analytics to solve problems. Proven ability to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. Strong planning and organizational skills as well as attention to detail.', 'About Ring', ' Prepare ad hoc reports.', ' Familiarity with call center technology and compliance. Experience with support operations for technical products. 1+ years of experience with SQL. 2+ years of experience with Microsoft Office. Proficiency with data visualization tools such as Tableau.', ' Proficiency with data visualization tools such as Tableau.', ' Experience with cross-functional teams.', ' Provide ideas for process improvements to enhance efficiency, quality, and the customer experience.', ' Strong planning and organizational skills as well as attention to detail.', ' Analyze and report on performance and identify trends, opportunities, issues, concerns, and successes.', 'Company', ' Experience using analytics to solve problems.', ' Inspect and improve current processes including attendance impacts, behavioral trends, and the quality of customer support tools.', ' Support the leadership team by providing multi-channel contact driver analyses. Solicit feedback and recommendations. Inspect and improve current processes including attendance impacts, behavioral trends, and the quality of customer support tools. Analyze and recommend process improvement for key business drivers such as first call resolution, transfers and escalations, concession rates, and other defined metrics. Prepare ad hoc reports. Analyze and report on performance and identify trends, opportunities, issues, concerns, and successes. Work with the team to improve performance through creative process improvement and implementation of new strategies. Identify KPI trends by segment. Provide operational gap analysis and reporting, and orchestrate change management with identified trends. Collaborate with leadership to ensure operational objectives are reached for the optimal customer experience. Identify best practices across Ring. Provide ideas for process improvements to enhance efficiency, quality, and the customer experience. This position requires that you handle various contacts types including: chat, email, and inbound & outbound calls with customers.']

They are responsible to provides all the business rules, transformation logic, derived column expressions, etc. This position will also be a liaison between Data Architecture and Data Management, Data Stewardship, lines of business and the ETL group to align business needs with enterprise data management strategy and solutions.']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Core Values', 'Benefits', " Ones we actually live by Lead with integrity We operate at a high level of integrity that is deeply rooted in large ways and in small daily activities and practices. We act with honor and truthfulness in all that we do. Be supportive We achieve the best results through the combined efforts of each individual. Our culture creates an eagerness in employees to take initiative and personal interest in the people with whom they work with. Foster inclusivity We place a high value on equality and fair treatment in the workplace. All employees are treated with a high level of respect all while ensuring a safe, diverse and welcoming work environment free of any form of discrimination. Extreme ownership We own everything in our world, to an extreme degree. We are responsible for not just those tasks which we directly control, but for all those that affect whether or not our mission is successful. Trust-based culture Our executive team maintains open communication and radical transparency in all aspects of the business. We also provide an open line of communication for all employees to voice their opinions. We welcome all suggestions and improvements by team members. Be positive We are a team where positivity is contagious. We’re truly passionate about what we do and look for others who approach their work with the same energy. We're not afraid to get messy and view every challenge as an opportunity to learn and grow. We value talent and dedication just as much as we encourage creativity and passion. We also believe diversity drives innovation. We are committed to inclusion across race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status or disability status. We celebrate multiple approaches, and diverse points of view that drive us forward every day. If you require an accommodation in order to participate in our hiring process, please contact us to make your needs known in advance to ensure appropriate accommodations are in place. Due to COVID-19, our standard recruitment process has slightly changed. Click here to learn more about how Underground Cellar is continuing to hire during this time and what you can expect throughout the hiring and onboarding process."]

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Analyze financial and operating information to develop data to answer the questions that are being asked by the department leaders, affiliated dental groups, and business units.Participate and lead planning and development sessions to identify data that is required to complete analysis to answer the posed business question(s).processes and procedures both across and within the mortgage servicing teamDevelop a streamlined process flow based off of both technology and industry expertise', 'Responsible, dependable, quick learner', 'Job Description', 'Root liquids software’s is a web and mobile application development company. Our purpose is to help businesses and professionals excel in the technology environment through strategic, efficient and effective solutions catering to their unique needs. We provide professional development and consulting services in web and mobile applications development. Our service reaches out to web based solutions including website designing, eCommerce solutions and integration solutions as well as applications catering to advanced mobile technology. ', 'Company Description', 'processes and procedures both across and within the mortgage servicing team', 'Analyze financial and operating information to develop data to answer the questions that are being asked by the department leaders, affiliated dental groups, and business units.', 'Participate and lead planning and development sessions to identify data that is required to complete analysis to answer the posed business question(s).', 'Preferred willingness to relocate nationwide in the US for projects.', '0-1 year of experience', 'Demonstrated ability to adapt to new technology', 'Bachelors or Masters Degree', 'Bachelors or Masters Degree0-1 year of experienceResponsible, dependable, quick learnerDemonstrated ability to adapt to new technologyPreferred willingness to relocate nationwide in the US for projects.', 'Develop a streamlined process flow based off of both technology and industry expertise']

Salesforce questions are easily answered by anyone willing to dig into their Trail Blazer online community. ', 'Work with a team of fun and motivated individuals in a highly collaborative culture', 'Opportunity to revolutionize the real estate industry with a mission to help those in need', 'About The Role', 'Extremely competitive health benefits; retirement benefits; commuter savings and more', 'Salesforce certifications preferred but not required', 'Shadow users in your division for a minimum of 4 hours per week. You can’t anticipate their needs if you don’t know their day in and out. ', 'Competitive cash salary and compelling equity package based on experience', 'Scale with a rapidly growing organization, with tons of opportunity for growth ', 'Gather requirements from your team and write user stories and scope docs for Salesforce enhancements. Your knowledge of your team and of Salesforce should make you the first and only stop when a Salesforce admin has questions about your scope.', 'Understand the concepts that our Salesforce admins use to build and maintain the system. This includes user roles, profiles, permission sets, objects, fields, record types, page layouts, workflows, validations, flows, and process builders', ' You’re a self-starter who enjoys researching something new. Salesforce questions are easily answered by anyone willing to dig into their Trail Blazer online community.  Suburb organization skills and attention to detail. If it’s not written down it didn’t happen. You loveKanban boards. You used to have a color coordinated day planner in middle school. You’re naturally curious. You want to understand why users do what they do, not convince them why they are wrong. You’re also curious about data. You’re just pretty curious all around! You don’t wait to be asked a question by someone else. You bring your team insights when you flag a new issue. Written and verbal communication is off the charts. Anyone can read your project documentation and quickly understand the requirements.  You’ve worked as a Salesforce admin in the past but are looking for a role that requires more time with users solving business problems. ', ' Gather requirements from your team and write user stories and scope docs for Salesforce enhancements. Your knowledge of your team and of Salesforce should make you the first and only stop when a Salesforce admin has questions about your scope. Train users on new features after deployment Maintain user documentation for your division’s workflow manuals and other key resources. Individual team are expected to own their core policy manuals (we call these workplays) but you own everything at the next altitude up.  Troubleshoot errors and bugs. You are your team’s first stop for all things Salesforce. Don’t worry, if you can’t solve there’s always an escalation path to the Tech Solutions team! Shadow users in your division for a minimum of 4 hours per week. You can’t anticipate their needs if you don’t know their day in and out.  Support divisional leaders and Team Leads in training new team members. Team Leads are responsible for training on the core function of the job (think sales scripts). You are responsible for Salesforce training.  Our data and analytics team ultimately owns the company-wide reporting. However, it’s your responsibility to obsess over it. Your division leader and users should hear your data insights and questions regularly. Build, maintain, and collect feedback on your division’s Salesforce dashboards. Propose new dashboards and reporting tools as appropriate. You are the data ninja your team turns to and should remain one step ahead of their needs. Understand the concepts that our Salesforce admins use to build and maintain the system. ['', 'Passion and experience with Daily Fantasy Sports and with DraftKings’ DFS product in particular is a major plus, but not required. We expect that if you do join us, you will become a passionate user of our product.', 'Identify and ideate, along with our Product team partners (Product Managers, Designers, Researchers, Developers, etc.), improvements to our flagship DFS product.Develop a strong understanding of how customers behave and identify, through data, areas for improvement in the user experience of our desktop and native app platforms.Become a data expert, promoting data fluency throughout the organization and become a champion for data/research-based decision-making.Build and execute test plans to measure how new features are driving changes to customer behavior.Work alongside partner teams to implement your recommendations.Own core product KPIs and the tracking and monitoring of those KPIs.', 'Develop a strong understanding of how customers behave and identify, through data, areas for improvement in the user experience of our desktop and native app platforms.', ' What you’ll do as a Product Analyst - DFS:', 'You are an empathetic and supportive team player.', 'Own core product KPIs and the tracking and monitoring of those KPIs.', 'You thrive in a fast-paced environment, and you are curious and adaptable.', 'Love data? We do too.', 'What Skills You Will Use', 'Join Us!', 'Identify and ideate, along with our Product team partners (Product Managers, Designers, Researchers, Developers, etc.), improvements to our flagship DFS product.', 'You have a BS in Mathematics, Business, Engineering, or a related field.', 'Apply now.', 'Ideally, you have 1-2 years of analytics experience, preferably at a B2C e-commerce company.', 'Knowledge of statistics and hypotheses testing. Model building experience is a plus.', 'Work alongside partner teams to implement your recommendations.', 'Build and execute test plans to measure how new features are driving changes to customer behavior.', 'Ideally, you have 1-2 years of analytics experience, preferably at a B2C e-commerce company.You have knowledge of Tableau (or other data visualization tools) and experience with SQL, R, and/or Python. Additional programming language experience is a plus.Knowledge of statistics and hypotheses testing. Model building experience is a plus.You thrive in a fast-paced environment, and you are curious and adaptable.You are an empathetic and supportive team player.You have a BS in Mathematics, Business, Engineering, or a related field.Passion and experience with Daily Fantasy Sports and with DraftKings’ DFS product in particular is a major plus, but not required. We expect that if you do join us, you will become a passionate user of our product.', 'Become a data expert, promoting data fluency throughout the organization and become a champion for data/research-based decision-making.', 'You have knowledge of Tableau (or other data visualization tools) and experience with SQL, R, and/or Python. Additional programming language experience is a plus.']

['', '• Should be able to work independently and own project coordination as needed', '• Performs quality assurance on other team members’ work and provide technical and design input', '• Desire to learn about new and emerging technologies in the field of data science', '• Writes and validates SQL queries to extract data from production system for reporting', 'Job Qualifications', '• Proficient in data visualization and modeling (Ex. Sisense, Tableau, Power BI)', '• Implement Python scripts to automate time-consuming or repetitive tasks. Scripts frequently interact with SQL Server or REST APIs.', '• Coordinate with other development teams and DevOps counterparts to support system architecture', 'Experience: 1-5+ years of experience in data analysis or reporting', '• Manage extract, transform, and load process for external data sources', '• Gain mastery of Clinical Surveillance & Compliance software products to support report design', 'Education: BS/BA in science, engineering, information systems or other related degree required', '• Occasional maintenance of automated report pipelines built in Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) packages.', '• Experience working with Linux is a plus', 'Our client is looking to add an Data Analyst/Developer. The role, which works closely with the Product Owner, is responsible for the delivery/development of reports and visualizations that delight our customers and improve patient care. All candidates should be proficient with SQL, relational databases, raw data analysis, data visualization tools, and have experience leading delivery teams or managing high-profile projects. Great candidates will be creative, curious, data-driven problem solvers, and detail-oriented with the ability to take a step back and view the big picture.', '• Opportunities to partner with applied data science team to develop novel machine learning models', '• Excellent organizational and prioritization skills', 'Other Knowledge, Skills, Abilities or Certifications:', '• Work directly with subject matter experts to design and build relevant and intuitive data visualizations', '• Occasionally develops custom web scripting (JavaScript) to extend functionality of analytics software', '• Use CI/CD pipelines to ensure quality software in an agile environment (Git, TeamCity)', '• Experience with advanced Excel functionality and SSIS services is a plus', 'Location - Madison, WI (remote to start but will need to be onsite after WFH order is lifted)', '• Experience in healthcare IT is a plus', '• Excellent attention to detail and thorough validation work skills', '• Participate in research and feasibility evaluation on new product offerings and new features', '2 Positions Open - Junior and Senior level ', '• Maintain a high-level knowledge of healthcare organizations: workflow, processes, procedures, clinical information systems', 'Essential Duties and responsibilities:', '• Proficient with SQL and relational databases', '• Create documentation on the process used to generate new datasets and reports', '6-12+ Month Contract to Hire Position ']

['', 'We are seeking self-motivated individuals with strong research, writing and interpersonal skills to join our team on a one-year training/associate contract, working remotely.', 'The Research Associate will: ', 'Enjoy working as part of a collaborative, diverse team', 'Help to produce presentations and other externally facing material.', 'Also desirable:\xa0Skills in Excel or PowerPoint; proficiency in a second language.\xa0', 'Candidates should: ', 'Help compile and organize data from surveys and field sources.Research complex topics and assemble material for publication/analysis.Work with our analysts, technical experts and engineers in support of research engagements.Learn to edit/write short research reports for publication, and to contribute to longer reports.Help to produce presentations and other externally facing material.', 'Have excellent written and spoken English communication skills', 'Learn to edit/write short research reports for publication, and to contribute to longer reports.', 'Possess intellectual rigor and curiosityHave excellent written and spoken English communication skillsHave solid numeracy skillsEnjoy working as part of a collaborative, diverse team', 'If interested please provide a cover note describing in 200 words or less how you can be impactful in this position.', 'Help compile and organize data from surveys and field sources.', 'Uptime Institute’s Intelligence unit is the independent research arm of Uptime Institute. We publish regular, authoritative and insightful reports on all aspects of digital infrastructure for our members and thousands of followers around the world. Our research areas range from energy and environmental sustainability to data center design and operations, from IT outages to innovation, and from economic cost modeling to staffing and diversity requirements.\xa0', 'Work with our analysts, technical experts and engineers in support of research engagements.', 'Research complex topics and assemble material for publication/analysis.', 'Possess intellectual rigor and curiosity', 'Have solid numeracy skills', 'This is an excellent opportunity to learn about the fast growing, critical industry from the inside, and to contribute to influential reports and data projects that are used the world over.', 'All of these activities will be done under the supervision of a senior analyst or more senior member of the research team.']

Within that scope, this role will primarily focus on revenue cycle analytics, payor contracting, and payor relations. To do this successfully, there must be an understanding of how data interacts with operational processes across multiple departments and platforms. Our sites support specialty physician services, infusion therapy, and leading-edge research on new medications for complex and rare disease states. Our service model makes it easy for patients to receive intravenous therapies 365 days a year with the support of physicians, advance practice providers, nursing, and pharmacy services. Our focus is always to provide a high-quality, low cost, exceptional patient experience at every interaction.', 'Manager Title: ', '· Perform quality review and validity tests on data and reports for various functions of the business', '· Provide key insights for development and maintenance of performance dashboards, productivity metrics, and data-driven workforce analytics to support growth.', "· Education - Bachelor's Degree or equivalent in experience required. ['', ' Ensure the quality of solutions configured through data validation and UAT testing. Responsible for creating data driven solutions and business insights that help answer complex business problems. Conceptualize, develop, implement, and maintain reporting solutions for monitoring and analyzing business performance for wide audiences within Power BI. Maintain Power BI visualization suite including report access, building new reports, dashboards, and visualization solutions, and app creation while adhering to reporting standards and best practices. Translate end-user requirements into technical specifications for development and BI teams. Tell stories with data, and help our business make data driven decisions through data visualization and BI reporting. Develop and document test plans, new procedures, training, and communications for end-users. Perform and document data analysis, data validation, and data mapping/design. Play a key role in planning and delivery of BI solutions, integrations and analysis. Desired Skills and Experience Bachelor’s Degree in related field preferred Experience with reporting and data visualization tools such as Power BI, SSRS, Tableau, or similar BI tools. Relational database foundational understanding plus data modeling experience Experience with T-SQL, DAX, and Power Pivot, & Power Query Programming preferred but not required: KQL, JavaScript. Adaptable, observant, and approachable with a strong collaborative spirit. Results-oriented with a robust drive to accomplish objectives and meet high standards. Superior critical thinking and creative problem-solving skills. Excellent organizational, verbal, and written communication skills. Understanding of and complete alignment with n2y culture, mission, and values.', 'Responsibilities']

['', ' - Ability to understand, communicate and engage effectively with multiple stakeholders and interactions', ' - Creates acceptance criteria that is clear, concise and actionable', ' - 3-4 years Ecommerce experience', ' - Manages a story backlog to ensure readiness of user stories for the upcoming sprint', ' - Reliable, punctual attendance is an essential function of the position', ' ', ' - Identifies opportunities for improvement across product, process and team', ' - Works with cross functional teams and departments including, but not limited to: data engineering, machine learning and AI, mobile app and web development, digital product owners, etc.', ' - Strong problem-solving, listening, written and verbal communication, and decision-making skills', 'Preferred:', ' - Works with Dev and QA to understand the boundaries of any given story', ' - Works with User Experience (UX) analysts to ensure prototypes convey story intent', 'The Business Analyst will be working with motivated teams on highly visible and valuable customer-facing digital products. This position requires an excellent communicator with outstanding analytical skills, in order to collaborate with business users, technology teams and leadership in an Agile environment.', ' Job Responsibilities:', ' - Analyzes data to ensure features are aligned with product goals/objectives and delivering the most business value', ' - 1-2 years Agile/Scrum experience', 'The Digital organization is seeking a Business Analyst to join the Digital Personalization team. The Senior Business Analyst will work as part of our focused product team transforming business requirements into detailed user stories, in order to deliver best-in-class digital experiences for our customers. This individual will also support the product owner in overall roadmap planning and product strategy.', ' - Translates high level requirements into detailed level requirements (user stories) to be consumed by the development pods in each sprint, while ensuring stories and features are added iteratively to the product to add overall value', ' - Facilitates agile rituals such as inception, iteration and story kickoff, estimation sessions, and help to keep team up-to-date with changes in priorities and to be available to answer questions quickly', ' - Contributes to overall definition of strategy and scope, including working with business stakeholders to understand why we are working on something before development begins', ' Required:', ' - Successful completion of interview required to meet job qualification']

', "Outstanding\xa0communication and passion,  as you'll be working with many stakeholder groups", 'Strong skills in Excel like file linking', 'Basic SQL querying skills (a must)', 'An ability to collaborate with developers and other technical personnel to ensure adherence to business requirements and stakeholders’ needs', '\xa0', '1-2 years ', 'act independently ', 'Good knowledge of brokerage back-office operations like trade dates and settlement dates.', 'An ability to act independently and solve novel problems as they arise!', 'An excellent candidate will have most of these traits:', "You will not act a “button pusher.” and will be making decisions at multiple steps of an array of possible processing paths.\xa0\xa0The role is 60% to 70% process adherence/observance and 30% to 40% process improvement/re-engineering.\xa0The analytics resulting from the Data Operations Analyst’s interaction with data, process, systems, and humans will be of immense importance to our platform's objectives!", '**We will not be taking applications from recruiters, bench salespeople, or recent grads. Please refrain from applying to this position.**']

job_title: Jr Data Analyst / SQL Server Developer
job_text: ['', 'Work on project teams to solve business problems with technological solutions.', 'Experience with SQL Server 2014, 2016 and 2017.', 'A bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, Accounting, or Information Technology or equivalent combination of education and work experience.', 'Design, build and maintain SSAS cubes and data marts.', 'Possess an analytical mindset with exceptional problem-solving ability.', 'Description', 'Build strong relationships with key business stakeholders and technology partners.', 'Build skills in SSIS for data processing, retrieval and other transformation tasks.', 'Develop SQL queries for ad hoc data requests.', 'A bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, Accounting, or Information Technology or equivalent combination of education and work experience. Strong verbal and written communication skills, for both technical and business audiences. Functional knowledge or direct experience with data modeling and data warehousing. Proficient in Excel using advanced features such as pivot tables, vlookup, etc. Functional knowledge of financial analysis, budgeting, forecasting and key performance indicators. Experience with SQL Server 2014, 2016 and 2017. Broad exposure with the SQL Server product stack, including Analysis Services (SSAS), Integration Services (SSIS), Reporting Services (SSRS) and Power BI. T-SQL development skills for building queries for data mining and analytics. Possess an analytical mindset with exceptional problem-solving ability. Demonstrate perpetual learning and improvement. ', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills, for both technical and business audiences.', 'Create/modify reports in SSRS and Power BI.', 'Broad exposure with the SQL Server product stack, including Analysis Services (SSAS), Integration Services (SSIS), Reporting Services (SSRS) and Power BI.', 'The Candidate Will Be Expected To', 'T-SQL development skills for building queries for data mining and analytics.', 'Demonstrate perpetual learning and improvement.', 'Work closely with our accounting team to assist with financial analysis and reporting.', 'Proficient in Excel using advanced features such as pivot tables, vlookup, etc.', 'Functional knowledge of financial analysis, budgeting, forecasting and key performance indicators.', 'Functional knowledge or direct experience with data modeling and data warehousing.', 'Effectively and clearly communicate with other employees in all departments and levels of management.', 'Build strong relationships with key business stakeholders and technology partners. Effectively and clearly communicate with other employees in all departments and levels of management. Work closely with our accounting team to assist with financial analysis and reporting. Design, build and maintain SSAS cubes and data marts. Create/modify reports in SSRS and Power BI. Develop SQL queries for ad hoc data requests. Build skills in SSIS for data processing, retrieval and other transformation tasks. Work on project teams to solve business problems with technological solutions. ']

Our 401K - $1 for $1 match up to 6% with immediate vesting, plus AIG automatically contributes an additional 3% in to your 401K regardless of if you enroll or not.', 'We care about your professional development. Our career progression program will provide you with the opportunity to develop your skills, strengthen your productivity and be eligible to progressively advance to positions with an increased responsibility and increased compensation.', "Who we are  American International Group, Inc. (AIG) is a leading global insurance organization. Building on 100 years of experience, today AIG member companies provide a wide range of property casualty insurance, life insurance, retirement solutions, and other financial services to customers in more than 80 countries and jurisdictions. These diverse offerings include products and services that help businesses and individuals protect their assets, manage risks and provide for retirement security.  As a Business Analyst you will be responsible for work with multiple stakeholders; make sound decisions using data, analysis, experience, and judgment. The Business Analyst will be a self-starter and a resource driving powerful outcomes for our client. The ideal candidate will thrive in an environment where new ideas are encouraged where information may be limited.  Get to know the business  We do meaningful work every day, leveraging AIG's vast array of financial tools to make a difference in people's lives. From helping people cope with a severe illness or the loss of a loved one, to turning lifelong dreams such as weddings and college graduations into reality. We help our clients weather the ups and downs of life, ensuring they have a financial cushion that lessens the blow of an unexpected event. We're also there for the triumphs, helping our clients achieve important milestones.  AIG Life & Retirement is seeking a key person for its Illustration team. This individual will be responsible for developing, maintaining and implementing Individual life products in the Illustrations platforms used by agents in the field to sell Life insurance policies. The Illustration software calculates policy values projections according to policy holder's characteristics with a set of economic assumptions chosen by the user. Reprojection supports product illustrations for currently active and inforce policies. This position works closely with Product development, Pricing Actuarial, Operations, IT Product, Distribution and Marketing. The position is responsible for reviewing and testing all products implementations. Software quality is important to a competitive market, an innovative and cutting-edge product development environment.  About the role  We want to hear from you today if you can: ", 'Get to know the business', 'Paid Time Off (AIG recognizes the importance of work life balance). We offer 24 PTO days to start. YES, 24! 9 paid holidays per calendar year.', 'Providing technical specifications and business requirements for new products and features to be implemented in the Illustration software and web applications.', 'What our employees like most about working for AIG', 'American International Group, Inc. (AIG) is a leading global insurance organization. Founded in 1919, today AIG member companies provide a wide range of property casualty insurance, life insurance, retirement products, and other financial services to customers in more than 80 countries and jurisdictions. These diverse offerings include products and services that help businesses and individuals protect their assets, manage risks and provide for retirement security. AIG common stock is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and the Tokyo Stock Exchange.', 'About AIG', 'What we are looking for ', 'YouTube:', 'Demonstrated technology skills, including strong knowledge of Microsoft Excel and/or computer programming with SQL.', 'What we are looking for', 'YES, 24!', 'Join our Talent Network at http://www.aig.com/careers/life-at-aig/join-the-talent-network.  Additional information about AIG can be found at www.aig.com and http:// www.aig.com/strategyupdate | YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/aig | Twitter: @AIGinsurance | LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/company/aig. These references with additional information about AIG have been provided as a convenience, and the information contained on such websites is not incorporated by reference into this press release.']

Business Intelligence & Modeling: Performs data analysis and develops enterprise reporting system.', 'C&N is seeking a highly motivated and experienced professional to fill an immediate opening as a Marketing Data Analyst within any of our C&N locations.  Locations include the following Pennsylvania Counties: Bradford; Cameron; Bucks; Lycoming; McKean; Potter; Sullivan; Tioga; York or in one of the following New York Counties: Chemung; Steuben. The qualified Marketing Data Analyst develops, maintains, tracks, and optimizes the company’s data models, automation systems, reporting systems, and dashboards that support and lead business decisions.  The Marketing Data Analyst works closely with teams like Finance, IT, Operations, and senior executives to manage and optimize processes for data intake, validation, mining, modeling, and visualization. job_title: Market Research & Data Analysis Fellow - Fitness, Wellness, & Health
job_text: ['', 'Responsibilities:', 'Market Research & Analysis Fellow - Fitness, Wellness, & Health', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Professional network of executives, experts, and entrepreneurs', 'Eudaimonia Labs: ', '\xa0________________________________________________________________________________', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fitness & Wellness focused venture investing', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Accountable to complete projects on time', 'We are looking for a Market Research & Analysis Fellow - Fitness, Wellness, & Health to assist with market research, company research, data analysis and automation, among other responsibilities. The fellowship would last 4-6 months depending on availability and needs. This is a remote fellowship - we are open to fellows across the US and Canada.', 'Qualifications:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong technology background; open to majors in computer science, engineering, or similar', 'We look forward to hearing from you.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Be an active participant in brainstorming and problem solving', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Diverse group of early startups', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0High quality research process with unique product offering', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Previous experience in a Market or Technical Research environment ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passion about learning fast and curious about solving problems', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to commit 5-10+ hours per week; open to discussion', '\u200b', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong enthusiasm for startups and innovation; strong interest in fitness or wellness', 'Ability to commit 5-10+ hours per week; open to discussion', 'Fellows will be exposed to:\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Come ready to learn and work', 'Eudaimonia Labs: A Fitness & Wellness Ecosystem for Founders.\xa0We are the premier seed accelerator for the Fitness & Wellness industry. We back founders who build (non-pharma) tools, in the broadest sense, that can be used by millions of humans to improve their well-being. From pre-seed to seed stage companies, we invest across fitness, wellness, and personal health. Our core team and executive roundtable provide strategic advice and critical resources to empower founders in the development of innovative solutions for the Fitness & Wellness ecosystem.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Give feedback on and reflect on best practices', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrated competence with data analytics and quantitative methods']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', 'Marketing Vendor', 'Data', ' Marketing Design – Work independently and/or with vendors to create graphic designs, photography and video editing to create media that coincides with marketing strategies and communications needs.', ' Partnerships – Analysis of all aspects of partnership relationships, partner, co-branded products and services, use data and creative skills to develop future partnership opportunities and marketing strategies, acquire partner data including traffic, sales, demographics, and consumer profiles for Nutmeg marketing decisions.', 'Acquisition', ' A 4-year college Bachelor of Science degree in Marketing, and a minimum 3 years of experience in corporate marketing, or equivalent combination of education and experience, is required.', ' Must be able to lift up to 10 pounds', 'Physical Demands', 'Partnerships', 'Marketing Strategies', 'Experience', ' Some travel required between various CT retail locations', 'Marketing Design ', 'Position Description', ' Marketing Strategies – Structure vendor strategies to align with Nutmeg strategies, develop/monitor internal marketing strategies, present Marketing performance reviews, budget performance, and progress of goals.', 'Product & Service Marketing', ' Requires standing and/or sitting for an extended period of time', ' Data – Use all available Core data, partner data, and 3rd party vendor data, determine all data points needed to achieve all objectives, communicate unavailable data points and needs, and develop regular reporting to support all objectives.', 'Company Overview', ' Marketing Channels – Analysis of marketing performance for legacy and strategy locations as well as all digital channels.', ' Marketing Vendor Responsibilities – Communicate and give direction to 3rd party marketing vendors regarding existing or future marketing strategies, ensure vendor is performing in alignment with strategies and contractual agreements, present spending budgets to vendors, track results of sales performance and measure ROI, and review marketing invoices (provide to Balance/Capital Assets for approvals).', 'Intellectual ability to learn all tasks related to reaching maximum proficiency in this position.', ' Product & Service Marketing – Use of data to support target product offers, create member and non-member aggregates using all data to target consumers, determine which products to offer to produce the most value, recommend product needs and promotional product specs, analyze services offered in partnership relationships, and marketing for member and non-member consumer product portfolios to deepen product relationships.', ' Experience – Provide analytics which encompass all aspects of the Nutmeg experience, acquire data and provide reports on all channels of consumer touch points and product delivery, recognize and develop marketing opportunities available from new or improved experiences.', ' Must possess superior communication skills, both orally and in writing; and, possess high level computer skills for word-processing, spreadsheet, database, and presentation software programs.', 'Marketing Channels', ' Acquisition – Analysis of acquisition strategies and marketing results, development of data driven recommended strategies, and recognition of acquisition opportunities within existing or potential strategies.', 'Essential Functions']

['', "As a data analyst at Redjack, you'll be responsible for developing analytics that run on more than 50 trillion business communications per year to solve the world's biggest cyber resilience challenges. These analytics will help our team to address our clients' business resilience, cybersecurity, and digital transformation needs.", 'What you should have accomplished', 'Streaming data analysis', 'Work as part of a team, collaborate effectively, and communicate continuously.', 'Your job will be to develop cutting-edge analytics to make businesses and the government more resilient.', 'High-performance analysis leveraging a cloud-based analysis platform (Databricks, BigQuery, etc)', 'Apply a variety of data analysis and machine learning techniques in cloud-based environments.', 'Your job', 'You have made a significant contribution to a software and/or analysis project that leveraged either:Streaming data analysisHigh-performance analysis leveraging a cloud-based analysis platform (Databricks, BigQuery, etc)', 'Apply a variety of data analysis and machine learning techniques in cloud-based environments.Apply development best practices in everything you do, including test-driven development, continuous integration, and DevOps.Work as part of a team, collaborate effectively, and communicate continuously.Learn new technologies and grow your skills and experience. Learn from others on your team.Teach and mentor others so we can make each other better.', 'You have been building analytics and analytical software professionally for at least two years.', "You have been building analytics and analytical software professionally for at least two years.You have made a significant contribution to a software and/or analysis project that leveraged either:Streaming data analysisHigh-performance analysis leveraging a cloud-based analysis platform (Databricks, BigQuery, etc)Your software projects involved regular code reviews, collaboration, and engagement with customer stakeholders.You have training as an engineering thinker: a bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.", 'Well assess your skills and ensure your impact will scale with your ability. What were looking for to start:', 'Teach and mentor others so we can make each other better.', 'Your software projects involved regular code reviews, collaboration, and engagement with customer stakeholders.', ' develop cutting-edge analytics to make businesses and the government more resilient.', "You have training as an engineering thinker: a bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.", 'Streaming data analysisHigh-performance analysis leveraging a cloud-based analysis platform (Databricks, BigQuery, etc)', 'As a cyber resilience company, we solve security, continuity, regulatory, and efficiency problems for our customers. Youll help protect the jobs and security of millions of people while working on and advancing novel techniques in computer science. Youll be connected to everything thats happening; every developer on the team is responsible for our products quality, everyone ships production code, and everyone directly supports the mission.', 'We have multiple positions at all experience levels, so whether youre still new to the industry or youve been around a while, dont hesitate to get in touch.', 'Learn new technologies and grow your skills and experience. Learn from others on your team.', 'Your job will be to', 'Apply development best practices in everything you do, including test-driven development, continuous integration, and DevOps.', 'PM20', "We are looking for people who share our core values of heroism, audacity, curiosity, and excellence to join our team. We are a tight-knit group of engineers, analysts, and business professionals who have organically built a company that monitors more than 8% of the Internets public IP space and 40 trillion business communications per year. We've had a huge impact on the Fortune-50 and Government sectors over the past year, so we're looking to grow rapidly while maintaining our culture and diversity."]

analyze, map and developing reporting to support required business analytics.Analyzing business needs, identify problems, propose and track solutions for alignment with desired \xa0outcomes and present findingsUnderstanding the requirements of the assigned client accounts and translate business data into a form easily dissected, understood and acted on by a service team.Applying analytical skills to business requests (which are often high-level or lacking in detail) and communicate these business wants/needs in a clear and unambiguous manner.Developing reporting mechanism/analytics for business leadership to ensure quality metrics and customer satisfaction standards are achieved.\xa0Actively engage in the monthly business review with the leadership teams reporting on key business results and initiatives.\xa0Providing analysis for the business scorecard and dashboards for driving\xa0the achievement of business metrics.\xa0', 'This position is based in Nashville, Tennessee.', 'Understanding the requirements of the assigned client accounts and translate business data into a form easily dissected, understood and acted on by a service team.', 'Actively engage in the monthly business review with the leadership teams reporting on key business results and initiatives.\xa0', 'You are responsible for (but not limited to)', 'Take on the primary responsibility for analyzing business operations data to provide leaders with detailed information needed to build actionable plans to address business needs and gaps.\xa0 \xa0Identify trends and opportunities to create operational and financial efficiency; as well as, support identification of growth opportunities within the business.', 'or', 'Flexible work style, adaptable to internal and external customer requirements supported by a creative mind and the ability to think out of the box.', "As an equal opportunity employer, Philips is committed to a diverse workforce. In order to ensure reasonable accommodation for individuals protected by Section 503 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Vietnam Veterans' Readjustment Act of 1974, and Title I of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990, applicants that require accommodation in the job application process may contact 888-367-7223, option 5, for assistance.", 'Master’s Degree, preferred – but not required', 'Advanced software skills with demonstrated knowledge of Microsoft Office (specifically Excel and Access), Power BI (or Tableau), and SAP.', 'Developing reporting mechanism/analytics for business leadership to ensure quality metrics and customer satisfaction standards are achieved.\xa0', 'To find out more about what it’s like working for Philips at a personal level, visit the Working at Philips page on our career website, where you can read stories from our employee blog. Candidates need to live within the territory or within commuting distance to Nashville, Tennessee.\xa0', 'It is the policy of Philips to provide equal employment and advancement opportunities to all colleagues and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, ethnicity, religion, gender, pregnancy/childbirth, age, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability or perceived disability, genetic information, citizenship, veteran or military status or a person’s relationship or association with a protected veteran, including spouses and other family members, marital or domestic partner status, or any other category protected by federal, state and/or local laws.', 'Great attitude, enthusiasm, and high energy', 'Excellent interpersonal skills with ability to interact effectively at all department and organizational levels', 'Equal Employment and Opportunity Employer/Disabled/Veteran', "Bachelor's Degree in business or related field, required", 'To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience', 'ontact 888-367-7223, option 5, for assistance.', 'Why should you join Philips Global Business Services?', 'In this role, you will have the opportunity to', 'Ability to consistently meet and exceed goals; set priorities, and deliver results on time', 'If you are a Colorado resident and this role is a field-based or remote role, you may be eligible to receive additional information about the compensation and benefits for this role, which we will provide upon request.\xa0 You may contact 888-367-7223, option 5, for assistance.', 'Additionally, we offer you the ability to partner with, learn and grow from colleagues in a highly complex, global organization where you can use your strengths to help drive a strategic business for Philips. We will support your personal and professional development with the opportunity to further advance your career in a company that believes in offering its employees challenges and opportunities to grow professionally and personally.', '3+ years of solid analytical/problem-solving skills.', 'Analyzing business needs, identify problems, propose and track solutions for alignment with desired \xa0outcomes and present findings', 'Strong project management skills with proven track-record of performance and in leading teams.', 'A vastly dynamic organization and growing team, where you will be the go-to person for data and business analytics, providing key analytic insight, data and strategic input to develop tools and processes to improve functions associated with customer satisfaction, compliance, manpower planning, financial and operational planning and trends related to tasks associated with direct growth of the business.', 'You are part of', 'Lean expertise with continuous improvement mindset, bonus', 'Applying analytical skills to business requests (which are often high-level or lacking in detail) and communicate these business wants/needs in a clear and unambiguous manner.', 'The opportunity to personally contribute to Philips’ achievement of growth objectives and the ambition of improving the lives of 3 Billion people a year by 2025. Your contributions will enable broader deployment of solutions that address some of society’s most pressing health issues.', 'In return, we offer you', 'US work authorization is a precondition of employment. The company will not consider candidates who require sponsorship for a work-authorized visa.', 'Working at Philips is more than a job. It is a calling to make life better for people through your meaningful work, focused on positively impacting 3 billion lives a year by 2030. You will be challenged every day to think fast and work innovatively by building knowledge and sharing best practices to help our business to grow.', "Bachelor's Degree in business or related field, requiredMaster’s Degree, preferred – but not required3+ years of solid analytical/problem-solving skills.Flexible work style, adaptable to internal and external customer requirements supported by a creative mind and the ability to think out of the box.Excellent interpersonal skills with ability to interact effectively at all department and organizational levelsAbility to consistently meet and exceed goals; set priorities, and deliver results on timeStrong project management skills with proven track-record of performance and in leading teams.Advanced software skills with demonstrated knowledge of Microsoft Office (specifically Excel and Access), Power BI (or Tableau), and SAP.Lean expertise with continuous improvement mindset, bonusAbility to work individually and under minimal supervision.Great attitude, enthusiasm, and high energy"]

['', 'Essential Duties/Responsibilities', 'Other Required Experience/Qualifications', '*Please note: The ideal candidate will have a mechanical aptitude and/or a maintenance or purchasing background. They also need to be comfortable with computers, ideally SAP. Weekend and OT work is expected, especially when the project goes live. Please make sure your candidate is 100% OK with this. Shift: 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM Will overtime be possible (Y/N): Yes, expected OT as needed. Will weekend work be possible (Y/N): Yes, 8AM - 4:30PM as needed. Work Environment: Production Dress Code/Required PPE: Long pants (jeans), steel toe shoes, Essential Duties/Responsibilities: Essential function will be to Set up new parts in SAP. Work with vendors on quoting items. Manage master data of all packaging, ingredient, and MRO items for the facility. This will include walking down parts and physically assessing the part and making data recommendations to best suit the plants needs. Work with minimal supervision while meeting strict deadlines. Provide status updates to the master data team and materials managers. Minimum Education Required: High School Diploma Other Required Experience/Qualifications: Ability to lift up to 50 lbs., ability to use measuring tools such as measuring tape, calibers, is unassisted. Work in a fast paced environment and having a sense of urgency for needed items. Must be detail oriented. Additional Preferred Experience/Qualifications: Maintenance background or SAP experience is a plus. Ability to be resourceful on gathering data. Highly able to utilize a computer and essential applications such as Microsoft Office Applications.SDL2019-1032', 'Additional Preferred Experience/Qualifications', 'Job Requirements', 'Description', 'Please note: The ideal candidate will have a mechanical aptitude and/or a maintenance or purchasing background. They also need to be comfortable with computers, ideally SAP. Weekend and OT work is expected, especially when the project goes live. Please make sure your candidate is 100% OK with this.']

['', 'At Bozzuto, it’s all about experience. Whether it’s the experience you bring, gain or give, we want your journey to be exceptional. Guided by our core values of creativity, concern, passion and the pursuit of perfection, we’ve been creating inspiring, engaging and vibrant communities for three decades.', 'BA/BS degree1-3 years of marketing analytics, business analytics, or data analysis experience.Previous experience with web analytics tools. Google Analytics preferred.', 'In addition to our award-winning culture, a myriad of opportunities to grow professionally and personally, great-looking offices, and a positive and supportive environment, Bozzuto offers a wide range of insurance options, programs, and benefits that let you and your family be healthy and plan for the future. Including:', 'Leverage data trends and findings to make recommendations that improve website user experience and lead conversion metrics.', 'Comprehensive and affordable health plansFree life insuranceEmployee wellness incentivesCompany-matched 401KTeledoc, free 24/7/365 access to a doctor online', 'Free life insurance', 'Primary Responsibilities:', 'Collect, analyze, and create reports from digital marketing data sources and provide insights on lead gen and advertising campaign performance.', 'Use Google Analytics capabilities and reporting such as segmentation, source/medium, channel, audience, conversion, and multitouch attribution to understand site visitor behaviors and uncover opportunities to improve website performance.', 'As a Digital Marketing Analyst, your primary responsibilities include:', 'BA/BS degree', '1-3 years of marketing analytics, business analytics, or data analysis experience.', 'Comprehensive and affordable health plans', '\xa0', 'Bozzuto is proudly an Equal Opportunity Employer EOE/M/F/D/V.', 'What We Bring You:', 'Previous experience with web analytics tools. Google Analytics preferred.', 'Collect, analyze, and create reports from digital marketing data sources and provide insights on lead gen and advertising campaign performance.Use Google Analytics capabilities and reporting such as segmentation, source/medium, channel, audience, conversion, and multitouch attribution to understand site visitor behaviors and uncover opportunities to improve website performance.Leverage data trends and findings to make recommendations that improve website user experience and lead conversion metrics.Implement and QA website pixels and tracking tags.', 'Company-matched 401K', 'Why do we do it? Because home is where aspirations are pursued, and memories unfold. We believe in the power to impact the lives of the people we touch through the delivery of extraordinary experiences.', 'What You Bring to Us:', 'We want our team members to be happy and healthy, both personally and professionally. Our benefits take into consideration everything from career development to family matters, health and wellness. Bozzuto is committed to doing everything it can to offer you quality benefits and healthcare coverage—including access to the best doctors and hospitals at an affordable price.', 'Teledoc, free 24/7/365 access to a doctor online', 'As a Digital Marketing Analyst, you are an essential member of the Marketing team and will analyze and generate reports and insights from different data sources to help us uncover opportunities to increase conversion rates and lead acquisition.', 'Employee wellness incentives', 'Implement and QA website pixels and tracking tags.']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Support all facets of the Risk Management Team with strong data analytic skills for critical projects around modeling, credit policy and fraud prevention.
