job_title: Senior Data Visualization Analyst - full-time, remote
job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0Visualization Tools: Strong Power BI and DAX experience preferred, will look at Tableau and similar', 'Must be passionate about digging into data and have a knack for Data Visualization, Dashboarding & Storytelling, understanding the stories the data can tell.\xa0You will analyze complex data sets and transform the data into knowledge through appealing and understandable visualizations that improve business performance.\xa0You will partner with the global BI team to understand the needs of global business leaders and analysts then leverage a variety of tools to facilitate global data insight delivery. ', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to manage projects and competing priorities', '-Global Fortune 500 company in process of digital transformation', '-they use PowerBI, will look at candidates with experience with PowerBI, Tableau, or other data visualization tools', '-full-time direct-hire position with our client (not contract)', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0Microsoft BI Experience in Microsoft tools: SQLServer, Azure Synapse, & Tabular Models preferred', 'To qualify, applicants must be legally authorized to work in the United States and should not require now, or in the future, sponsorship for employment visa status', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrated ability to tell stories and make dashboards actionable', '-hiring manager is looking for a true expert to make the data tell the story', '-remote option for US based candidates', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0Business oriented thinking vs focusing solely on technology ', '-position open due to growth', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0Thoughtful problem-solving acumen', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience applying user experience design principles to dashboards and visualizations', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong learning agility to understand key business drivers', '-\xa0\xa0\xa07+ years of business intelligence development, with 5+ years in data visualization', 'Responsible for designing, modeling, and supporting transformative enterprise data models and dashboards.\xa0As the data visualization expert, you will collaborate with other technical partners and business leaders to convert big data into visually appealing insights.\xa0You will utilize agile methodology and transformative products/platforms to achieve organization goals.']

['', ' Researches law enforcement crime data techniques, best practices, and new developments.', ' Develops and recommends standard Department metrics procedures and methods to support on-going crime data reporting and analysis; proposes standard operating procedures based on data.', ' Responds to ad hoc requests for reports and/or analysis to help police personnel identify, define, and solve specific problems.', 'Description', ' Analyzes telephone records; tabulates and categorizes call activity by caller/recipient, geography, and demographics; completes cross tabulation of data to show relationships and trends.', ' Researches special projects for administration as needed.', ' Ability to do research methods and techniques; descriptive statistics; multivariate statistical methods; data mining; types of crimes and modus operandi associated with gang-related crime, drug-related crime, and white-collar crime; and requirements for intelligence file creation, retention, dissemination, and purging.', ' Ability to perform occasional overtime work and be available to flex hours to report to work early and/or stay late, to include holidays and weekends.', ' Composes concise but comprehensive reports of findings, employing tables, charts, maps, and graphs to present data.', ' Obtains feedback from Police Department personnel concerning preliminary findings and analysis.', ' Performs other work as assigned.', ' Uses GIS or similar mapping software to map crime incidence, police activity, and related data.', ' Compiles data to create patrol maps and crash maps; evaluates and interprets information; selects essential elements, correlates new information with existing information, identifies trends, patterns, and other relationships among data points.', ' Maintains confidentiality about information learned on the job and has the ability to deal with sensitive information.', ' Compiles crime, police activity, demographic, and related information from various records or existing databases within or external to the Police Department.', 'Essential Functions', ' Compiles crime, police activity, demographic, and related information from various records or existing databases within or external to the Police Department. Prepares descriptive statistics of data; analyzes data using cross tabs, correlation, or other multivariate statistical techniques. Uses GIS or similar mapping software to map crime incidence, police activity, and related data. Compiles data to create patrol maps and crash maps; evaluates and interprets information; selects essential elements, correlates new information with existing information, identifies trends, patterns, and other relationships among data points. Obtains feedback from Police Department personnel concerning preliminary findings and analysis. Composes concise but comprehensive reports of findings, employing tables, charts, maps, and graphs to present data. Analyzes telephone records; tabulates and categorizes call activity by caller/recipient, geography, and demographics; completes cross tabulation of data to show relationships and trends. Develops and recommends standard Department metrics procedures and methods to support on-going crime data reporting and analysis; proposes standard operating procedures based on data. Responds to ad hoc requests for reports and/or analysis to help police personnel identify, define, and solve specific problems. Researches law enforcement crime data techniques, best practices, and new developments. Confers with County crime data analysts. Researches special projects for administration as needed. Ability to do research methods and techniques; descriptive statistics; multivariate statistical methods; data mining; types of crimes and modus operandi associated with gang-related crime, drug-related crime, and white-collar crime; and requirements for intelligence file creation, retention, dissemination, and purging. Develops and maintains liaison with the intelligence community at Federal, State, County, and Municipal levels to share information on criminal activities or suspected criminals under investigation. Ability to perform occasional overtime work and be available to flex hours to report to work early and/or stay late, to include holidays and weekends. Maintains confidentiality about information learned on the job and has the ability to deal with sensitive information. Performs other work as assigned.', ' Prepares descriptive statistics of data; analyzes data using cross tabs, correlation, or other multivariate statistical techniques.', ' Develops and maintains liaison with the intelligence community at Federal, State, County, and Municipal levels to share information on criminal activities or suspected criminals under investigation.', ' Confers with County crime data analysts.']

['', 'Position Overview:', 'Qualifications', 'This position is currently approved for 8 weeks, as we also conducts out search for this position as a FTE.\xa0The selected contractor may also be considered for the FTE position, and would eligible for conversion\xa0', 'SAS and/or SQL - Must be proficient with data collection from data warehouse, data marts or external datasets, and related data analysis methodologies', 'Must consistently manage expectations and deliver projects according to strict timelines in a highly collaborative environment', 'Preferred Experience:', 'Job Description:', 'The Analyst serves as an organizational resource for market analyses and strategic planning support. The incumbent conducts research, analysis and interpretation of internal and external data in support of Medicare and Medicaid lines of business.\xa0The incumbent has broad knowledge of market and business intelligence resources and is skilled at integrating multiple sources of data and information to provide meaningful analyses that will serve as key insights and inputs into management decisions and the strategic planning process. Work includes both reporting and standardized analyses, as well as ad-hoc “as needed” requests from division leadership. Key areas of focus include market segmentation, product and channel performance and overall market opportunity insights.\xa0', 'Able to summarize findings and create presentation style ready responses to reporting requests', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Intelligence & Analytics, Finance, Statistics, or Health Care Analytics\xa03+ years of experience in the field', 'As part of the Business Strategy & Data Analytics team, the Analyst will be responsible for technical design, development, and implementation of complex reporting mechanisms. The incumbent manages both recurring (monthly/quarterly) and ad hoc data/information processes as well as report development and analysis across multiple functions. The Analyst has a command of descriptive and diagnostic analytics as well as skills in predictive analytics and modeling that inform business and market strategy.\xa0', 'This position is currently approved as contract, however the selected contractor could be considered for conversion in the future.', 'Location: Remote, Must be Local to the Twin Cities', 'Able to analyze and interpret results using a variety of analytical and presentation tools that include Excel, PowerPoint, and Qlik', 'Able to independently collect data, organize, analyze and deliver interpretation in response to both recurring and ad hoc reporting requests from a BIG data environment', '\xa0', 'Education:', 'Working with market data in support of product evaluations, new segmentation, and new market development', 'Dahl Consulting is currently partnering with a leading company in the health care industry. We work one-on-one with great candidates to help connect them with local employment opportunities. This company is hiring a Healthcare Analyst for a contract position! Interested? Get more details below!', '3+ years of experience in the field', 'Familiarity with healthcare related data or sources such as health management, population health, population demographics, geospatial data, etc.', 'Health Insurance experience, specific to Government Programs (Medicare and Medicaid)Able to independently collect data, organize, analyze and deliver interpretation in response to both recurring and ad hoc reporting requests from a BIG data environmentSAS and/or SQL - Must be proficient with data collection from data warehouse, data marts or external datasets, and related data analysis methodologiesAble to analyze and interpret results using a variety of analytical and presentation tools that include Excel, PowerPoint, and QlikAble to summarize findings and create presentation style ready responses to reporting requestsMust consistently manage expectations and deliver projects according to strict timelines in a highly collaborative environment', 'Required Experience', 'Tableau, Qlikview and Salesforce and/or Dynamics', 'Job Title: IT Healthcare Analyst', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Intelligence & Analytics, Finance, Statistics, or Health Care Analytics\xa0', 'Health Insurance experience, specific to Government Programs (Medicare and Medicaid)', 'Analyzing Customer Relationship Management results and creation of advanced Sales reporting', 'The contract position would focus on end to end analytics; from harvesting data using SAS/SQL to creating analyses in Excel and PowerPoint for leadership, Marketing, Product and Sales.\xa0Presentations would provide insights regarding Medicare and Medicaid Membership and Enrollment metrics.\xa0', 'Familiarity with healthcare related data or sources such as health management, population health, population demographics, geospatial data, etc.Analyzing Customer Relationship Management results and creation of advanced Sales reportingWorking with market data in support of product evaluations, new segmentation, and new market developmentTableau, Qlikview and Salesforce and/or Dynamics']

we are realizing many quantitative and qualitative outcomes as result of the team’s formation but there are still aspects of the work that are in formation; someone in this role should have flexibility and adaptability to grow with the process and help make it better ', 'Gathers requirements for new requests and/or details regarding incidents', 'Experience with Python (Pandas, Numpy, etc) a plus.', 'Strongly encourage, healthcare experience - provider and or payer.', 'Flexibility and adaptability - the group is new and is improving rapidly; balancing workload across multiple clients requires strong organizational skills', 'Ensures bugs created for incidents and updates with details', 'Strong technical and analytical skills with proven ability in identifying weaknesses in data flow design, recommending solutions and improving quality.', 'Execute on objectives through a business stakeholder relationship centered around providing accurate data to clients in a timely manner', ' Examine existing reports to understand current req/performance and identify opportunities for operational improvement Work closely with Client Success and external clients on identifying, documenting, communicating and seeking resolution on modifications to existing artifacts that go out to clients as well as data processing rules that govern how we use client data Proactively assemble and analyze data for business and client needs, making sure data and calculations are accurate and issues promptly resolved Execute on objectives through a business stakeholder relationship centered around providing accurate data to clients in a timely manner Proactively identify issues with new and existing clients related to the creation and delivery of data through reports and feeds; job_title: Data/Reporting Analyst – Client and Portfolio Reporting
job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', 'Barings has an opening in the Global Technology & Operations organization for a developer/analyst to support the Client Services and Client Delivery teams. The ideal candidate would have a strong background using the Microsoft SQL Server suite of products (SSMS and SSRS), proven experience using cloud database technologies, as well high-level business knowledge in the area of investment products and compliance. The candidate will work directly with business partners throughout the development lifecycle, from the requirements gathering stage through post implementation support. In addition, the candidate will work closely with both on-site and offshore personnel to develop and enhance offerings in our portfolio of products. The position will report to the manager of the Client and Portfolio Reporting team.\xa0', 'Microsoft SQL Server 2016/2017 and T-SQL skills including custom Functions, Views, Stored Procedures, and Query developmentMicrosoft SQL Server Reporting ServicesVisual Studio, VSTS/DevOpsExperience with cloud-based database implementations, such as Microsoft Azure or Amazon RedshiftTest plan development and executionData modeling experienceExperience working within an agile development framework', 'Primary Responsibilities\xa0', 'Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services', 'The Client and Portfolio Reporting team develops and implements technology-based reporting solutions for the Client Services and Client Delivery organizations within an agile framework. Internal stakeholders rely on the Client and Portfolio Reporting team to use their business and technical knowledge to create reports and data structures that help ensure the validity and stability of data using modern, scalable methods.\xa0 This role requires the ability to approach a request, analyze challenges and possible solutions, and build stable, sustainable products that can be supported globally. Project opportunities include but are not limited to firm-wide reporting structure enhancements, BI dashboard development, report development, and data extract automation and delivery. Barings has a fast paced environment and the team often manages multiple assignments and initiatives simultaneously to meet strategic targets or deadlines.', 'Visual Studio, VSTS/DevOps', 'Experience working within an agile development framework', 'Strong analytical skills required, including a thorough understanding of how to interpret customer business needs and translate them into application and operational requirements', 'Seismic report development', 'Visio / ERD tools', 'Primary Responsibilities', 'Ability to understand business subject matter, workflows', 'Location: Charlotte, NC or London, UK', 'Strong sense of urgency and desire to see solutions implemented expediently', 'Data modeling experience', 'Job Summary', 'Minimum 3 years’ experience as a systems developer/analyst, preferably in the Financial Services Industry.', 'Technology Skill Sets Required:', 'Technology Skill Sets Desired:', 'Experience with cloud-based database implementations, such as Microsoft Azure or Amazon Redshift', 'Minimum 3 years’ experience as a systems developer/analyst, preferably in the Financial Services Industry.Ability to understand business subject matter, workflowsStrong analytical skills required, including a thorough understanding of how to interpret customer business needs and translate them into application and operational requirementsExcellent verbal and written communication skills and the ability to interact professionally with a diverse group including; executives, managers, IT personnel, and subject matter expertsStrong sense of urgency and desire to see solutions implemented expediently', 'Power BI, Tableau, or other business intelligence tools', 'Barings is a $345+ billion* global financial services firm dedicated to meeting the evolving investment and capital needs of our clients and customers. Through active asset management and direct origination, we provide innovative solutions and access to differentiated opportunities across public and private capital markets. A subsidiary of MassMutual, Barings maintains a strong global presence with business and investment professionals located across North America, Europe and Asia Pacific.', 'Microsoft SQL Server 2016/2017 and T-SQL skills including custom Functions, Views, Stored Procedures, and Query development', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills and the ability to interact professionally with a diverse group including; executives, managers, IT personnel, and subject matter experts', 'Other Qualifications:', 'Power BI, Tableau, or other business intelligence toolsSeismic report developmentVisio / ERD tools', 'Test plan development and execution', '1as of December 31, 2020']

['', 'Demonstrated success operating in an environment that required heavy peer, stakeholder, and company leadership influence-ability regarding ideas, methods, and deliverables. Ideally, in support of a digital product or marketing group, collecting requirements, and delivering insight for product improvement.', 'What we need from you…', 'You are responsible for the development, deployment, and maintenance of dashboards for the consumer product team including product owners', 'Demonstrated problem-solving skills, including proven analysis of situations, identify existing or potential problems, and recommending sound conclusions and implementation strategies', 'Preferred', 'Some experience with Python and exposure to data mining, ETL, usage of data warehouses as well as advanced Excel skills', 'You conduct thorough analyses to develop/validate consumer segmentations, develop and compute consumer value metrics and support ad-hoc requests for data extraction, modeling, and analysis cross-functionally.', ' You conduct thorough analyses to develop/validate consumer segmentations, develop and compute consumer value metrics and support ad-hoc requests for data extraction, modeling, and analysis cross-functionally. You use advanced statistical, econometrics, and quantitative analysis techniques to develop an in-depth understanding of consumers You provide data analytics/statistical support to the Product Management team and own our testing program to ensure the features proposed are well-understood and observed behavior of them in a test is in line with actual outcomes You prepare clear and concise data visualizations and presentations to enhance business decision making; experience leveraging Tableau or similar software is a must You are responsible for the development, deployment, and maintenance of dashboards for the consumer product team including product owners You work across the organization and leverage cross-functional teams to provide expert analytical service You are responsible for working cross-functionally (product, engineering, design, IT, etc.) to deliver analytics support for the consumer product organization as needed You validate and update analyses and dashboards periodically and provide reports as needed You bring strong organizational, analytical, and problem-solving skills ', 'A Few Of Our Perks And Benefits', 'You prepare clear and concise data visualizations and presentations to enhance business decision making; experience leveraging Tableau or similar software is a must', ' Immediate 401k match ', 'Comfortable narrating data-driven insights and translating technical concepts into simple terminology for a variety of technical and non-technical stakeholders at various levels.', ' Flexible spending accounts ', 'You provide data analytics/statistical support to the Product Management team and own our testing program to ensure the features proposed are well-understood and observed behavior of them in a test is in line with actual outcomes', 'Advanced experience working with SQL, an expert preferred. job_title: Entry Level Data Engineer Analyst / Python Developer
job_text: ['', 'Experience in machine learning, artificial intelligence and/or artificial neural networks. ', 'Experience with Tensorflow, Theano or Keras. ', 'Experience with command-line scripting, data structures and algorithms and ability to work in a Linux environment, processing large amounts of data in a cloud environment. ', 'Availability to travel and live in the U.S.', 'Experience with command-line scripting, data structures and algorithms and ability to work in a Linux environment, processing large amounts of data in a cloud environment. Experience in machine learning, artificial intelligence and/or artificial neural networks. Proficiency in applying various mathematical and statistical models to include, but not limited to: discrete event simulation, factor analysis, genetic algorithms, Bayesian probability models, hidden Markov models, sensitivity analysis, sampling, probability, multivariate data analysis, regression, PCA, time-series analysis. Broad understanding of databases (e.g. SQL, NoSQL, Lucene, Mongo), and high-performance or distributed processing (e.g. using MapReduce, Spark, Pig, and/or Hive). Experience with visualization software (Tableau, D3, MicroStrategy, PowerBI).\u202f Experience delivering solutions in an Agile environment. Experience with Tensorflow, Theano or Keras. Portfolio of public & private data science projects you’re proud of (GitHub, Kaggle, DrivenData, etc.) Publications in peer-reviewed journals. Other programming languages such as Scala, Java, R Benefits & Perks', 'Ability to work across multiple engagements with clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using structured problem solving and communication to both technical and non-technical audiences. ', "Master's degree from an accredited college/university in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, Econometrics, or related fields, PhD is preferred. Alternatively, Bachelor’s Degree with at least 2 years’ experience as a Data Analyst, Data Scientist, or Research Assistant. Strong Proficiency in Python or Java programming language, or expertise with functional/object-oriented programming. Ability to translate objectives to a project plan with milestones, and resource/technology requirements, and teach, lead, and manage projects/people/clients to successful execution. Ability to work across multiple engagements with clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using structured problem solving and communication to both technical and non-technical audiences. Availability to travel and live in the U.S.Bonus points: ", 'Strong Proficiency in Python or Java programming language, or expertise with functional/object-oriented programming. ', 'Portfolio of public & private data science projects you’re proud of (GitHub, Kaggle, DrivenData, etc.) ', 'Benefits & Perks', 'Paid travel to and from the Atlanta HQ', 'Bonus points: ', "Master's degree from an accredited college/university in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, Econometrics, or related fields, PhD is preferred. job_text: ['', 'Business Analyst- MUST HAVE ETL EXPERIENCE ', 'Mentor\xa0and coach\xa0for the development of less tenured Business Analysts.', 'Embrace\xa0our culture of growth, change and continuous learning.', '5-8 years’ experience planning, eliciting, capturing, analyzing,\xa0and validating\xa0business, functional, and technical requirements.', 'Communicate effectively to other project team members and internal business partners as required.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:\xa0', 'Exciting opportunity for a\xa0Business Analyst\xa0to\xa0be responsible for identifying the tasks and techniques used to work as a liaison among stakeholders in order to understand business process, structure, policies, and operations of the organization with the goal of helping deliver new and enhanced processes, products, and services. Assist in formulating recommendations that enable the organization or business unit achieve its goals.', 'PREFERRED SKILLS:', 'Provide leadership in the evaluation of proposed solutions, ensure initial unit testing of all changes is completed, and further assess the deployed solution to ensure delivered results meet the needs of the business and or client\xa0(Solution Assessment and Validation).', 'Ensure involvement of project team members in the development of project estimates and that those estimates are delivered to our business partners and clients in a timely manner.', 'Experience as a Senior Business Analyst who is well-versed in\xa0Agile methodology.Experience working on data projects related to Data Reporting and/or ETL processes. ['', 'Strong verbal and written communication of statistical outcomes to multiple knowledge levels', 'Very strong MS Office skills (Word, EXCEL, PointPoint, etc.)', 'Ability to work under strict deadlines', 'Strong SPSS skills', 'Computer with internet connectivity', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Exceptional organizational and time management skills', 'Undergraduate or graduate-level degree in either Statistics/Mathematics or other Research-related field.', 'Requirements', 'We are seeking a data analyst/statistician familiar with SPSS to work remotely. The applicant should have the ability to conduct parametric and non-parametric statistics, interpret the result of those statistics, report the results, and verbally communicate the outcomes. The applicant will be assisting graduate students in running statistical analyses, reviewing and/or drafting the interpretation of statistical analyses, and ensure students understand those outcomes. The applicant should be able to work with a large number of projects simultaneously. We are a consulting firm, thus rely heavily on strong customer service.']

['', '2.\tFamiliarity with other Power Platform products and services', '3.\tFamiliarity with the full Microsoft BI Stack (e.g. Azure SQL)', '5.\tKnowledge with Data Science projects - a plus', 'If selected, you will be joining this cutting-edge reporting team and help drive the development of these reports and deliver them to literally hundreds of global enterprises. As such, high degree of accuracy, development efficiency, usability and speed are critical to the success of this engagement. ', '1.\tPrior experience on a Microsoft engagement or as an FTE', '4.\tReport design skills – focus on usability, performance, and security.', '8.\tMust be able to compile reports, training documentation and executive presentations,', '6.\tReport project lifecycle experience - from Design and architecture to change management.', '1.\tMinimum 4-6 years of Power BI experience', 'Desirable: ', 'Qualifications:', 'Launch Consulting Group is embedded in the development and support of the WpA service. Our teams provide a wide range of activities to Microsoft. We apply data science and AI to compile the workplace patterns data, we develop unique privacy and information protection capabilities, and we are leading the development of the Power BI reports by which businesses examine their own information. You can review some of these reports here: https://aka.ms/wpa-demos-pbi', '7.\tMust be able to collaborate with different teams. ', '3.\tStrong Power Query ‘M’ experience', '2.\tVery strong knowledge of DAX', 'You will leverage existing best practices and develop new techniques to accelerate and standardize report development. You will be involved in long term planning and developing a technical roadmap of the service as new capabilities become available in the Power BI product as well as in the WpA service. You will be responsible for surfacing technical limitations and possible work-around to the Microsoft team. You will also be accountable for the quality of the reports and be able to troubleshoot inconsistencies that may arise as a result of customer escalations. ', '5.\tExperience with ingesting multiple data sources and advance data modeling ', '4.\tKnowledge of working with Workplace Analytics – a plus', 'Today’s work environment is changing rapidly. Successful businesses depend on optimizing the collaboration between groups and helping employees manage their work-life-balance. Office 365 Workplace Analytics (WpA) service (https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/business/workplace-analytics) allows enterprise customers to monitor work patterns across their organization and take action to influence productivity and prevent erosion of its workforce in the digital age. ', 'As a senior member of the reporting team you will quickly become one of the main liaisons between the business owners who draw up the general requirements for the reports, the back end data teams who identify the source of the information needed, and the report development team who design the reports and test them for accuracy and performance. ', '6.\tKnowledge with Power BI online and Power BI embedded – a plus', 'Senior Data Analyst/ Architect/ Designer - Microsoft Workplace Analytics Team', 'Senior Data Engineer/Architect']

['Active Directory Experience. Data Concepts specializes in executing project solutions with expertise in Java, Microsoft, Open Source, Analytics, Cloud and Mobile technologies, AWS, and Azure. Our consulting engagements comprise firm-fixed price projects, time & material engagements, and a managed service IT staffing model. Expertise: Java, Microsoft, Mobile, Open Source, Microservices, and Big Data Services: Strategy, Development, UI/UX Design, Modernization, Cloud, PMO, Network Engineering, Security Engineering, and Enterprise System Administration. monitor data quality, partner with teams to identify issues and improve data, and manage data enrichment through third party data integrations', 'Partner with Sales, Marketing, and other business units to analyze, support, design, and troubleshoot multiple simultaneous initiatives through strategic analysis and operational designTranslate data into actionable insights that support business decisions and facilitate day-to-day operationsWork with Sales management to develop and execute data-driven sales strategiesPartner with Marketing to design informed market segmentation and campaign strategies that yield ROIDesign and manage efficient tools, workflows, and processes that support Sales and Marketing teamsManage Sales and Marketing data and reporting, with a focus on consistency and scalabilityDevelop and update dashboards, focused on key metrics and data that support strategic managementBuild and maintain a repository of reporting templates to support team self-service where possibleManage sales and marketing data; All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, age, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, physical or mental disability, and/or protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by applicable law.', 'BA/ BS in business or related field required2+ years professional experience in an analytical role required (preferably in Sales, Marketing, or Business Operations)Experience working with CRM (Salesforce, Dynamics 365, etc.), marketing automation (Marketo, Pardot, Hubspot, etc.), or similar tools required\xa0Advanced Microsoft Excel skills required, including data management, manipulation, analytics, and visualizationHighly detailed organizational, analytical, and problem-solving skills required, with critical attention to detail and excellent follow-throughAbility to analyze complex situations and generate innovative approaches to tackling new questions, generating insights, and solving for business needsAbility to quickly learn new technical systems / applications\xa0Ability to work cross-functionally with multiple departments and geographically distributed teams in highly collaborative environments\xa0Excellent project management skills with the ability to consistently meet established goals while balancing competing priorities / timelinesExcellent communication, collaboration, presentation, and interpersonal skills required\xa0Flexibility to accommodate seasonal and unpredictable changes in responsibilities, as required\xa0Language skills and experience in ed-tech or education fields a strong plusAbility to commute to corporate office in Boston, MA required (currently closed but will work in-office when reopened)\xa0', 'Why join us? We at Vista Higher Learning are proud to say that we’re not just another publisher. We’re the leading specialized language publisher for U.S. and Canadian higher education and secondary school markets whose first-hand knowledge of languages and diverse cultures sets us apart from other publishers.\xa0We’re passionate about developing educational materials that incorporate authenticity and culture. We bring a fresh new approach to teaching languages by integrating technology, design, content, and pedagogy to make learning easier, more practical, and more rewarding. With current programs in Spanish, French, Italian and German Vista Higher Learning is committed to helping people communicate across languages and cultures.', 'We’re looking for an experienced, highly analytical Revenue Operations Analyst with strong CRM and / or marketing automation skills and an appetite for problem-solving and optimization to keep the revenue operations engine running smoothly. You will work cross-functionally with Sales and Marketing teams to improve data quality, campaign strategy, and operational efficiency. You will also have the opportunity to take on challenges that make a real impact on our business and customers. We are looking for someone with innate curiosity who can jump in, help build tools, dashboards, and workflows as well as dig into analytics and help drive the continued success. The Revenue Operations Analyst is a key role within a highly collaborative team, committed not just to delivering projects, but doing so in fun and continually better ways.', 'Flexibility to accommodate seasonal and unpredictable changes in responsibilities, as required\xa0', 'Excellent project management skills with the ability to consistently meet established goals while balancing competing priorities / timelines', 'Build and maintain a repository of reporting templates to support team self-service where possible', 'Highly detailed organizational, analytical, and problem-solving skills required, with critical attention to detail and excellent follow-through', 'Ability to commute to corporate office in Boston, MA required (currently closed but will work in-office when reopened)\xa0', 'Partner with Marketing to design informed market segmentation and campaign strategies that yield ROI', 'Conduct in-depth analyses of Sales efforts, strategies, and transactions; identify high-value opportunities; provide insight and suggestions to support and improve strategies', 'Why join us? ', 'We are world-travelers, educators, editors, linguists, and technology enthusiasts. We’re explorers, innovators, thinkers, life-long learners, and creators. We’re a team of intellectually curious, seriously passionate, culturally-minded individuals who are dedicated to building highly engaging and authentic print and digital language products that foster an appreciation for world languages and cultures in and out of the classroom. If you share that passion for being the best, we want to talk! Our ideal candidate looks for creative solutions, is continually learning, and loves to develop best-in-class solutions to complex technical challenges.\xa0', '2+ years professional experience in an analytical role required (preferably in Sales, Marketing, or Business Operations)', 'Qualifications & Requirements:', 'Develop and update dashboards, focused on key metrics and data that support strategic management']

job_title: Data Analyst, Manufacturing and Process Performance Analysis
job_text: ['', 'Responsibilities', ' Commit to collaborate. Be a strong team player and business partner cross functionally. Understand the development goals, strengths and motivators of your colleagues and partner to achieve mutual success and continuous improvement as well as professional development. ', ' Ability to adapt and thrive in fast paced, changing environment ', ' Analyzes and interprets results, of laboratory-based studies. ', ' Supports process technology transfer with ongoing data analysis of process performance. ', ' Create data tools for analytics and metric boards to track progress ', ' Experience with high-volume data entry is a plus ', ' Strong organizational skills ', ' Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery etc. ', ' Experience working in the pharmaceutical industry or other regulated industry a plus ', '  Compiling, capturing, trending, and analyzing process generated data and subsequently using these findings to drive increased process understanding and consistency, develop improvements, or identify root cause  ', ' Preferred: Experience in regulatory inspections of manufacturing facilities ', ' Solid understanding of Good Documentation Practices (GDP) ', ' Preferred: Experience and knowledge of regulatory filings ', ' Proficiency in Microsoft Excel ', ' Strong organizational skills', ' Prepare detailed oral or written summaries of results with interpretation for projects/platform ', ' Executes and verifies data analysis in support of CPV type programs. ', ' Strong data management skills related to working with structured/unstructured data sets ', '  Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, , Life Sciences Information Systems, Software Engineering, Information Technology or a related field   Solid understanding of Good Documentation Practices (GDP)   Experience working in the pharmaceutical industry or other regulated industry a plus   Experience with high-volume data entry is a plus  ', '  Proficiency in Microsoft Excel   Strong organizational skills   Strong data management skills related to working with structured/unstructured data sets   Knowledge of data management tools and statistical analysis (SAS JMP); Experience with OSI Pi a plus.   Ability to show a track record of solving large, complex problems   Ability to adapt and thrive in fast paced, changing environment   Preferred: Experimental design/QbD.   Preferred: Experience in cell and gene therapy or viral vector production   Preferred: Experience and knowledge of regulatory filings   Preferred: Experience in regulatory inspections of manufacturing facilities   Proficiency in Microsoft Excel   Strong organizational skills', '  Works with process engineers and scientists to execute data analysis and application in support of late stage process development, technical troubleshooting, process monitoring, and optimization/improvement activities for manufacturing.   Supports process technology transfer with ongoing data analysis of process performance.   Executes and verifies data analysis in support of CPV type programs.   Maintain process information, documentation of process parameters, and tracking of process performance.   Analyzes and interprets results, of laboratory-based studies.   Performs data verification exercises as needed.   Prepare detailed oral or written summaries of results with interpretation for projects/platform   Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery etc.   Create data tools for analytics and metric boards to track progress   Manage individual performance to achieve business goals and objectives, as well ongoing professional development.  Manage performance: know what is expected, what it takes to be successful, and self-monitor progress. Be accountable to achieve results while demonstrating the Spark Values. Periodically review individual objectives to ensure alignment to corporate and functional objectives, making adjustments if priorities have shifted.   Commit to collaborate. Be a strong team player and business partner cross functionally. Understand the development goals, strengths and motivators of your colleagues and partner to achieve mutual success and continuous improvement as well as professional development.     Foster Spark’s Culture, Mission, Vision, and Values: Lead by example. Create an environment where team members thrive in our Culture by living our truths, always in compliance with applicable laws and regulations. Emphasize to employees that “how” they achieve performance objectives is just as important as “what” they accomplish.  ', ' Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, , Life Sciences Information Systems, Software Engineering, Information Technology or a related field ', ' Manage performance: know what is expected, what it takes to be successful, and self-monitor progress. Be accountable to achieve results while demonstrating the Spark Values. ['', ' Collaborate with a team of Business Analysts and provide direction of requirements management to other team members to ensure a well-trained and qualified staff. Excellent problem-solving and decision-making skills performing detailed analysis of business processes and goals. Penchant to understand “How” and ask “Why” in order to seek to understand complex business issues and objectives. Support Business SME’s in analyzing, documenting and validating process and application changes. Document and/or Enhance existing requirements and use cases to account for changes in core solutions and assist with revising test cases that would be leveraged by Testing teams Extensive background in backlog management including planning, refinement and estimation Strong work ethic; self-starter and motivator; strong sense of ownership. They break new ground today so tomorrow is easier to explore.For more information, visit northhighland.com and connect with us on LinkedIn , Twitter and Facebook .North Highland is an Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO)/Affirmative Action employer. ', 'Ability to develop and maintain strong interpersonal relationships with team members', 'Expected Contributions', 'Collaborate with a team of Business Analysts and provide direction of requirements management to other team members to ensure a well-trained and qualified staff.', 'Proficiency with Microsoft Office products, including Word, Excel and PowerPoint.', 'Support Business SME’s in analyzing, documenting and validating process and application changes.', 'What You Will Need', 'Document and/or Enhance existing requirements and use cases to account for changes in core solutions and assist with revising test cases that would be leveraged by Testing teams', 'Minimum of 5 years of business analysis experience.', 'LEAVE YOUR MARK ON A BETTER WORLD.', 'Provide Initiative insight and perspective into analysis, design, and preparation of new process and/or technology solutions to solve complex business problems.', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills.', 'Excellent problem-solving and decision-making skills performing detailed analysis of business processes and goals. ["Temporary role will involve extracting data from services and employment contracts, as well as invoices, into a spreadsheet for subsequent importation into Cobblestone contract management system. Applicant must have excellent attention to detail, be able to read and understand contracts, and quality check work before submission. Experience with excel necessary for execution of tasks and ability to communicate issues or questions clearly.\xa0\xa0Be a part of the ConsultNet difference. As a leading national provider of IT staffing and solutions, ConsultNet delivers exceptional services to startup, midmarket and Fortune 1000 companies across North America. Since 1996, we've partnered with clients to create rewarding opportunities for our consultants, successfully building teams that have surefire results. In the past two years alone, we have placed more than 1,500 consultants in contract, contract-to-hire, or direct placement opportunities. We understand communication is key to finding the right job that matches your skills and career goals. For us, it's not just the work that we do; it's how we do the work. Our breadth of offerings extends to multiple IT positions in major markets throughout the country, see more at www.consultnet.com"]

['', 'You can perform advanced data transformations in SQL and Excel', "3+ years of experienceYou can perform advanced data transformations in SQL and ExcelYou have experience using Business Intelligence tools like Looker to make data available to a broader audienceYou can utilize scripting languages like python and R to complete advanced analyses of massive datasetsYou can design and create thoughtful queries that identify outliers and unexpected changes in business metricsYou are comfortable reporting on the performance of digital marketing A/B testsExperience working with abstract concepts and simplifying requirements for easier consumptionYou are comfortable using basic statistics conceptsStrong technical skills, business sense, and clear communicatorYou're forward-thinking, dynamic, and innovativeYou're eager to learn", 'Carry Each Other', '3+ years of experience', 'Responsibilities:', "Data is your passion, you're eager to learn, and you're ready to fully exercise your skill-set.", 'Come HungryCarry Each OtherDrive Undeniable PerformanceRespect People, Privacy, IdeasBounce Back', 'Manage projects of the Analytics TeamDesign, Develop and Maintain new data setsPerform rigorous audits of existing data for validityReduce the current cost of data infrastructure with data minimization and query optimizationAutomate existing redundant tasks using data and tools like looker and airflowWork with cross-departmental key stakeholders to prioritize projects and translate business needs to analytics needsWork with members of the analytics team to hit KPI targets and ship new analytics products', 'What bonds our community together is our commitment to 5 Core Values:', 'Come Hungry', 'Reduce the current cost of data infrastructure with data minimization and query optimization', 'Strong technical skills, business sense, and clear communicator', 'Wunderkind is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status.', 'Wunderkind (formerly BounceX) is a leading performance marketing engine that delivers tailored experiences at scale. Digital businesses use Wunderkind to remember who users are better than ever before, allowing them to deliver high-performing, one-to-one messages on websites, through emails and texts, and in ads at a scale that’s not otherwise possible. Wunderkind recently acquired SmarterHQ so marketers can now unlock more revenue than ever before across SMS and email.', 'Work with cross-departmental key stakeholders to prioritize projects and translate business needs to analytics needs', "You're forward-thinking, dynamic, and innovative", "You're eager to learn", 'Manage projects of the Analytics Team', 'Experience working with abstract concepts and simplifying requirements for easier consumption', 'Automate existing redundant tasks using data and tools like looker and airflow', 'You are comfortable reporting on the performance of digital marketing A/B tests', 'Work with members of the analytics team to hit KPI targets and ship new analytics products', 'You can design and create thoughtful queries that identify outliers and unexpected changes in business metrics', 'You are comfortable using basic statistics concepts', 'Come join us on our mission.', 'Drive Undeniable Performance', 'Perform rigorous audits of existing data for validity', "Having raised over\xa0$44.9 million\xa0in funding from proven firms like Battery Ventures, Cross Creek Advisors and Primary Ventures, Wunderkind was named the Fastest Growing Software Company in America by Inc Magazine. With headquarters in\xa0New York\xa0and\xa0London, Wunderkind has been recognized by Glassdoor and Crain's for its exceptional culture and being one of the top places to work in the country. The company recently signed both the White House Equal Pay Pledge and the United Nations Women's Empowerment Pledge and continues to set the bar as a pioneer in technology innovation and workplace inclusion initiatives.", 'Respect People, Privacy, Ideas', 'You have experience using Business Intelligence tools like Looker to make data available to a broader audience', 'JOIN US ON OUR MISSION\xa0', 'Design, Develop and Maintain new data sets', 'Bounce Back', 'Requirements:', "We are looking for a seasoned data analyst to become a key player in our Data Product team. Successful candidates will be responsible for empowering our team with meaningful data, validating new products and features, identifying optimization opportunities, and utilizing automation techniques to improve team efficiency. The candidate will be working on a myriad of projects and efforts, including many driven by their own insights and findings. There's never a dull moment; repetitive tasks are non-existent. There's an absolutely incredible amount you will learn here, and you’ll be working with one of the largest user behavior datasets in existence.", 'Wunderkind drives $1.2 billion dollars annually in directly attributable revenue for top eCommerce brands like Uniqlo, Sonos and HelloFresh, often ranking as a top-3 revenue channel in their own analytics. ['', 'Send an email to\xa0jobs@relevant.healthcare\xa0with the subject line "Senior Health Center Data Analyst." When responding, include a resume and a note in the body of the email explaining your interest in the position. Please also include the phrase "hyena pesto" in your note, so that we know you read this.', 'Please also include the phrase "hyena pesto" in your note, so that we know you read this.', 'How to Apply', 'Join a\xa0small team of people\xa0(currently, there are 27 of us) who love what we do and continually strive to delight our customers.', 'Lead new health center implementations. ', 'Help us build the best possible analytics platform. ', 'Provide analytics support to our health centers. ', "Help us build a company culture that's friendly, respectful, and encourages continual learning.", 'Relevant’s mission is to support community health centers in their drive to improve patient health. We do this by providing smart, friendly analytics software, along with hands-on support and consulting to help health centers tackle all kinds of data challenges.', "We're committed to building a diverse company. Applicants who identify with groups that are under-represented in the technology industry are strongly encouraged to apply.", 'Preferred qualifications', 'Some experience with scripting languages such as Python or Ruby, or a desire and aptitude to learn.', "Excel wizardry. For example, we'd love for you to know everything there is to know about Pivot Tables.", 'Main responsibilities', 'Be nice, and value collaboration.', 'Knowledge and interest in the landscape of healthcare quality improvement and population health management.', "Lead new health center implementations. Conduct stakeholder meetings; develop a detailed understanding of customer business processes; extract, clean, and analyze EHR data; write lots of SQL… and get folks excited about collaborating with Relevant!Provide analytics support to our health centers. Ensure that our platform is being used as effectively as possible to improve patient outcomes and health center operations. Conceive, manage, and execute data initiatives for health centers; build reports and data visualizations as required; lead regular stakeholder meetings; provide advanced training and technical assistance to health center data teams.Help us build the best possible analytics platform. Identify improvements and new features for our platform based on feedback you've gleaned from customers, market research, insight into industry best practices, and your own domain expertise.", 'Working at Relevant', "3+ years' experience extracting clinical, operational, and financial data from electronic health record systems. A track record of successfully navigating messy database schemas and organizational politics to produce analytics that drive organizational change is a big plus.", 'Ability to write complex SQL queries. We’re looking for comfort with concepts like subqueries, temp tables, and window functions.', 'Thorough knowledge of a BI platform such as Tableau, Qlik, Cognos, or Crystal.', 'Competitive salary, excellent benefits (we pay 100% of employee healthcare premiums), 401(k) with employer contribution, generous vacation policy, and a general emphasis on happiness and sanity.', "Help us build the best possible analytics platform. Identify improvements and new features for our platform based on feedback you've gleaned from customers, market research, insight into industry best practices, and your own domain expertise.", "3+ years' experience extracting clinical, operational, and financial data from electronic health record systems. A track record of successfully navigating messy database schemas and organizational politics to produce analytics that drive organizational change is a big plus.Ability to write complex SQL queries. We’re looking for comfort with concepts like subqueries, temp tables, and window functions.Excel wizardry. For example, we'd love for you to know everything there is to know about Pivot Tables.Thorough knowledge of a BI platform such as Tableau, Qlik, Cognos, or Crystal.Knowledge and interest in the landscape of healthcare quality improvement and population health management.Excellent written and verbal communication skills. The ability to lead effective conversations with a variety of health center stakeholders, including technical folks, clinicians, and executives, is a key job requirement.Some experience with scripting languages such as Python or Ruby, or a desire and aptitude to learn.Be nice, and value collaboration.", "Join a\xa0small team of people\xa0(currently, there are 27 of us) who love what we do and continually strive to delight our customers.Help us build a company culture that's friendly, respectful, and encourages continual learning.", 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills. The ability to lead effective conversations with a variety of health center stakeholders, including technical folks, clinicians, and executives, is a key job requirement.', 'This job is both technical and people-oriented. Successful applicants may come from a variety of backgrounds, but if you have a track record as an outstanding analyst, analyst-manager, or director of data at a health center, hospital, or ACO, we’d particularly like to talk to you.', 'Lead new health center implementations. Conduct stakeholder meetings; develop a detailed understanding of customer business processes; extract, clean, and analyze EHR data; write lots of SQL… and get folks excited about collaborating with Relevant!', 'Provide analytics support to our health centers. Ensure that our platform is being used as effectively as possible to improve patient outcomes and health center operations. Conceive, manage, and execute data initiatives for health centers; build reports and data visualizations as required; lead regular stakeholder meetings; provide advanced training and technical assistance to health center data teams.', 'Health centers love working with us, and our data analysts are a key reason why. They lead implementations of our platform, often helping to resolve long-standing organizational pain points around data and reporting along the way. After implementation, they act as a resource for the health center’s internal data team, helping them solve hard problems, sharing knowledge and best practices, and building up their internal capacity.']

Identify areas for test improvement through analysis, experience and use of metrics. Ensure that the project schedule is adhered to and the work is completed according to the schedule. Participate in daily scrum activities. Develop and implement processes to manage the deployment of applications to new clients. Executes project testing procedures and create testing deliverables, especially for acceptance testing. Identifies and maintains test data. Identifies defects, issues and concerns encountered during testing. Maintains defect reports and status during test cycles. job_title: Senior Analyst/Associate- Portfolio Management, Project Finance
job_text: ['', 'The origination and execution of Project Finance transaction is done by the PIPF Origination and Execution Group which is a part of the Asset Finance and Securitization (“ASF”) group.', '• Perform financial modeling and run sensitivities for transactions; interpret model results and create summaries to be used in internal and external documents.', '• Strong Microsoft Office skills, especially financial modelling skills in Microsoft Excel.', '• Take ownership and lead other initiatives such as industry reviews, simulations of the entire portfolio based on certain parameters etc.', '• Good interpersonal skills and team spirit.', 'Power, Infrastructure and Project Finance (“PIPF”) provides advisory services, arranges, structures and advances non-recourse (or limited recourse) loans for client activities including power and energy; renewables, such as wind, solar and bio-fuel; and infrastructure projects. PIPF maintains a large, diversified loan portfolio of over 70 borrowers.', '• Understand and independently manage all aspects of a number of assigned Project Finance accounts, including credit, legal, and compliance issues. Assigned accounts could include several complex transactions including deals where BNPP is the Agent Bank. Deals will include, gas-fired merchant power plants, renewables, infrastructure projects, etc.', 'Minimum Required Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', '• Help in origination and execution activities wherever appropriate.', '•\xa0Prior experience in Project Finance (or other structured finance products).', 'FINRA Registrations Required:\xa0', 'N/A', '• MBA / CFA / CPA would be a plus', '• Good verbal and written communication skills required (ability to present a deal structure and highlights to credit committees, senior management, and other lenders).', 'FINRA Registrations Required:', 'Minimum Required Qualifications:', 'PIPF Account & Credit Management Team is a part of the Credit & Portfolio Management group, and is responsible for the monitoring and proactive management of the PIPF loan portfolio in North and Latin America, after the initial closing until termination / repayment.', '• Prepare credit and financial analysis and complete Annual Reviews and Quarterly Watchlist / Doubtful Reports.', 'Business Overview: ', '• Familiarity with and efficiency in reading and understanding legal documentation (preferably legal documentation related to Project Finance including security agreements and project agreements).', 'Agency Account Management:', 'Other:', '• Ability to work reasonably long hours and meet tight deadlines.', '• Spanish language will be a plus.', '• Liaise with the Bank’s Restructuring team for troubled deals.', '• Good understanding of and familiarity with financial statements, accounting, corporate finance principles, debt structures, etc.', '• Handle compliance and covenant related issues, including monitoring compliance receivables for each account.', 'Portfolio and Account Management:', '• Negotiate and co-ordinate amendment and waiver requests for deals Agented by BNPP; liaise directly with borrowers, legal counsel, consultants, and Lenders.', '• Prepare internal credit proposals for amendments, waivers, and other requests for deals where BNPP is a participant.', '• Prepare credit-focused memos for internal and external dissemination.', '• Respond to ad-hoc requests for reports and presentations from Risk and Management.', '• Update, discuss, and answer questions from participant Lenders on a daily basis.', '• Attend meetings and conference calls with Lenders and clients.', '• Review legal documentation and manage legal due diligence process with appointed lawyers.', '• Bachelor’s degree', 'Responsibilities:\xa0', '• Contribute to PIPF Portfolio Review, including overview of the PIPF portfolio, sector concentration, historical evolution of the portfolio, etc.', 'Preferred Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', '• Proactively identify risks in the portfolio and deteriorating credits; communicate proactively with senior managers, Risk officers, Origination team members, relationship managers etc.', 'Preferred Qualifications:']

ProQuest seeks to make reasonable accommodations that enable individuals with disabilities to perform essential duties when possible.', ' Apply the appropriate price guidelines and bid strategy across multiple channels for use in a single site or Consortia/state-wide/multi-site opportunities.', ' You want to see the impact of your contributions across a global organization! You’re a numbers person with a desire to work with a collaborative team. You’re highly analytical and love spreadsheets and working with excel.', ' Develop pricing strategies on small and large scale opportunities and when necessary works with cross-functional teams. Apply the appropriate price guidelines and bid strategy across multiple channels for use in a single site or Consortia/state-wide/multi-site opportunities. Understand competitive environments and manages appropriate market pricing that maximizes profitability. Use-analyzes of current prices and customer sets to evaluate consistency and support pricing for specific opportunities to best position us against competitive positioning while upholding the value of our products. Administer price approval policies. Provide input and facilitates steps to reach alignment on all non-standard pricing recommendations. Assist sales management with ad hoc requests for information. Ensure that relevant statistics are maintained. Build relationships with internal clients to develop compelling offers and gain buy-in from key stakeholders on significant opportunities. Design prepare and report appropriate key performance metrics.', 'Other Important Information', ' Administer price approval policies.', ' Provide input and facilitates steps to reach alignment on all non-standard pricing recommendations.', ' Ensure that relevant statistics are maintained.', 'Reasons you should apply...', ' Use-analyzes of current prices and customer sets to evaluate consistency and support pricing for specific opportunities to best position us against competitive positioning while upholding the value of our products.', ' Design prepare and report appropriate key performance metrics.']

', ' Analyze and interpret data to identify trends, patterns and opportunities for the business and clients. ', ' Review, analyze and evaluate business processes, procedures and user needs. ', ' Must be able to meet deadlines.', ' Provide data analysis to support, compile and report key information for operations and business objectives. ', ' Perform and participate in the analysis, design and implementation of business processes and procedures following appropriate standards. ', ' Review, analyze and evaluate business processes, procedures and user needs.   Provide data analysis to support, compile and report key information for operations and business objectives. Perform and participate in the analysis, design and implementation of business processes and procedures following appropriate standards.   Analyze and interpret data to identify trends, patterns and opportunities for the business and clients.   Communicate analysis and interpretation to appropriate audience.   Produce, publish and distribute operational reports relating to the development and performance of products and processes.   Conduct tests or test planning sessions, provide input for feasibility and prepare user documentation and follow-up evaluation.   Act as a liaison with various departments, management and staff to resolve problems and improve processes and procedures.   Perform project management leadership functions as a project manager or team member. ['', 'Work within a team of research scientists, data curators, and outreach and communication specialists to curate, distribute, and publicize highly-dimensional biomedical data sets coming from multiple NIH supported programs.', 'We’d love to hear from you if you:\xa0', 'Have an\xa0interest in learning about new high throughput biological technologies.', 'What you’ll be doing:\xa0', 'Have a master’s degree in computational field, library science, data management, OR a bachelor’s degree in one of the above areas with 3+ years of relevant work experience. A minimum of 2 years working with high dimensional data repositories is preferred.Have experience working with common biomedical data types derived from disease model systems and patients. Experience with gene expression and other omic data is preferred.Have an\xa0interest in learning about new high throughput biological technologies.Are proficient in a scripting language such as Python or R.Have a basic understanding of SQL.Are highly organized and have great attention to detail.Are able to work individually and within a team.Are passionate about open science and collaboration.', 'Have a basic understanding of SQL.', 'At Sage Bionetworks, we believe that we can learn more by learning from each other. We develop and apply open practices to data-driven research for the advancement of human health. We are working to establish actionable biomedical observations through the reliable analysis and responsible sharing of representative data. By improving the way scientists collaborate and by increasing the reliability of research, we will improve human health.\xa0', 'Develop or extend existing data models/schemas for projects in coordination with Project Leads.', 'Document data ingest processes and curation SOPs. Write data release notes. Produce data reports.', 'Are proficient in a scripting language such as Python or R.', 'Maintain research collections for disease communities, such as the AD Knowledge Portal (adknowledgeportal.org).', 'Are highly organized and have great attention to detail.', '\xa0', 'Are able to work individually and within a team.', 'Are passionate about open science and collaboration.', 'About Sage Bionetworks\xa0', 'Have a master’s degree in computational field, library science, data management, OR a bachelor’s degree in one of the above areas with 3+ years of relevant work experience. A minimum of 2 years working with high dimensional data repositories is preferred.', 'This position will play a critical role in our scientific research communities by providing support of biomedical data repositories through data curation, and the development of data formats and metadata standards. We are looking for someone who understands the complexities of combining heterogeneous biological data sources, the difficulties of standardizing metadata, and the value that these efforts provide in the support of reproducible research', 'In light of recent concerns of Covid-19, all interviews will be conducted remotely, and most positions will be remote through at least June 30, 2021. The option to work on-site at our Seattle office prior to June 30, will be considered upon request.', 'Sage Bionetworks is a nonprofit biomedical research and technology development organization that was founded in Seattle in 2009. Our focus is to develop and apply open practices to data-driven research for the advancement of human health. Data-driven research has become an important component of biomedicine, but it’s not always easy to understand how to apply computational approaches appropriately or how to interpret their results. Sage believes open practices can help. Our interdisciplinary team of scientists and engineers work together to provide researchers access to technology tools and scientific approaches to share data, benchmark methods, and explore collective insights, all backed by Sage’s gold-standard governance protocols and commitment to user-centered design. Sage is supported through a portfolio of competitive research grants, commercial partnerships, and philanthropic contributions.', 'Have experience working with common biomedical data types derived from disease model systems and patients. Experience with gene expression and other omic data is preferred.', 'Sage embraces diversity, equity and inclusion. We are committed to pay parity and making our salary ranges available to all employees. We invite you to apply and we welcome a conversation. We are based in Seattle, WA, and collaborate broadly throughout the world.', 'Work within a team of research scientists, data curators, and outreach and communication specialists to curate, distribute, and publicize highly-dimensional biomedical data sets coming from multiple NIH supported programs.Develop and document metadata standards for sharing datasets under the FAIR guiding principles.Develop or extend existing data models/schemas for projects in coordination with Project Leads.Document data ingest processes and curation SOPs. Write data release notes. Produce data reports.Maintain research collections for disease communities, such as the AD Knowledge Portal (adknowledgeportal.org).Streamline and implement new processes for data curation using scripting and statistical programming.Manage access to sensitive datasets in collaboration with the Sage governance team.', 'Manage access to sensitive datasets in collaboration with the Sage governance team.', 'Streamline and implement new processes for data curation using scripting and statistical programming.', 'Develop and document metadata standards for sharing datasets under the FAIR guiding principles.']

['', 'At least one of the following credentials a plus: CPA, CFA, MBA', 'Experience researching, analyzing, or auditing companies', 'Responsibilities:', 'Willing to travel occasionally', 'This job currently remote due to COVID, but Analysts would typically work from our office in Rockville, MD.', '2+ years plus experience in finance, auditing or accounting disciplineExperience researching, analyzing, or auditing companiesExperience with U.S. banks either at a regulatory agency, bank financial data provider, or within a bank CECL / capital modelling team preferredDeep knowledge of financial sector data and tools (S&P Market Intelligence/SNL, etc.) Strong background in financial statement analysisAt least one of the following credentials a plus: CPA, CFA, MBAStrong knowledge of and interest in financial marketsSuperior written and oral communication skills, and ability to work well within a team environmentExperienced presentation delivery, including comfort in discussing analysis and methodology in a face-to-face environment to prospects and clientsWilling to travel occasionally', '* Perform custom research projects for clients.', 'CFRA research analysts conduct and publish forensic financial statement analysis equity research on publicly traded companies for dissemination to its client base, including institutional investors, underwriters, regulators, and law practices. The analyst will work with team members covering a variety of companies and conducting bespoke analyses for clients. Research and analysis will be a combination of qualitative and quantitative research which ultimately leads to published research. This includes rigorous financial statement analysis as well as gathering and interpreting company-specific and sector-specific data, as the analyst develops and produces company and industry reports. You will play a key role in communicating this research to the client base therefore, strong communication skills as well as confidence to discuss research with senior portfolio managers and analysts are a must.  ', 'Experienced presentation delivery, including comfort in discussing analysis and methodology in a face-to-face environment to prospects and clients', '* Publish high-impact reports to be delivered to investment managers, hedge funds and others financial institutions detailing our research findings.', '* Collaborate with other members of industry sector teams and support senior analysts to develop research ideas.', 'Deep knowledge of financial sector data and tools (S&P Market Intelligence/SNL, etc.) Strong background in financial statement analysis', '* Communicate with clients regarding companies analyzed, industry issues or accounting topics of interest.', '2+ years plus experience in finance, auditing or accounting discipline', 'Requirements:', 'Experience with U.S. banks either at a regulatory agency, bank financial data provider, or within a bank CECL / capital modelling team preferred', 'Superior written and oral communication skills, and ability to work well within a team environment', '* Rigorous analysis of public company financial data, news and other information to identify the varied risks facing companies.', 'Strong knowledge of and interest in financial markets']

['', 'Provides advanced data insights for complex business problems that can be approached with analytics techniques to collect, explore, and extract insights from structured and unstructured data.', 'Qualifications', 'Leads the interpretation of data analysis and writing reports.', 'Participates in discovery processes with stakeholders to identify the business requirements and the expected outcome.', 'Additional Qualifications', 'Provides advanced data insights for complex business problems that can be approached with analytics techniques to collect, explore, and extract insights from structured and unstructured data.Has advanced expertise in the methods used to analyze data and advanced knowledge of data types, topics, and scientific challenges and approaches.Will work with other staff in developing data analysis tools and predictive models, using advanced data analysis techniques and artificial intelligence and machine learning.Participates in discovery processes with stakeholders to identify the business requirements and the expected outcome.Leads the interpretation of data analysis and writing reports.', 'Has advanced expertise in the methods used to analyze data and advanced knowledge of data types, topics, and scientific challenges and approaches.', 'Other Responsibilities', 'Will work with other staff in developing data analysis tools and predictive models, using advanced data analysis techniques and artificial intelligence and machine learning.']

['', '• Candidates should be able to possess a curious nature and think differently about data. He/she will also work closely with the Business Analyst to not only teach them to be better problem solvers, but also be willing to be persistent in pushing them to be better at looking at data differently', '• Candidates should have at least 5 years’ experience in applied analytics', 'Drug testing may be required; please contact a recruiter for more information.', 'The end client is unable to sponsor or transfer visas for this position; all parties authorized to work in the US without sponsorship are encouraged to apply.', '• It would be helpful if this person has some kind of background in IT with strong SQL skills a plus', '• Strong experience with business intelligence and analytics (including extraction, modeling, and presentation) working with extremely large amounts of data (over 1 million plus)', 'Hays is an Equal Opportunity Employer.', '• Advanced analytical skills and the ability to create insights and tell data stories through visualization', '• In addition to doing day-to-day work, candidates should have experience leading, coaching, and developing teams, and the ability to work well with technical and non-technical people', '• Working in a large retail, hospitality, or restaurant company a plus', 'Why Hays?', 'Role Description', 'Skills & Requirements', 'You will be working with a professional recruiter who has intimate knowledge of the Information Technology industry and market trends . Your Hays recruiter will lead you through a thorough screening process in order to understand your skills, experience, needs, and drivers. You will also get support on resume writing, interview tips, and career planning, so when there’s a position you really want, you’re fully prepared to get it.', 'Team Lead Business Analyst (Alteryx)– Perm - Orlando, FL', 'An Premier Full-Service Company is seeking a Team Lead Business Analyst (Alteryx) in Orlando, FL.', '• Proficiency in using Alteryx data analytics software', 'The Business Analytics Team Lead will lead a team of business and digital analysts while providing analytic partnership to business users throughout the organization by providing guidance and insights that help them make informed decisions about workforce and business initiatives. This individual will be responsible for guiding the approach and methodology for analysis, identifying relevant data sources, defining the variables to test/evaluate, and ultimately analyzing, visualizing, and drawing conclusions from the data. The individual will need to be a data evangelist challenging the team to think creatively about all data available and utilize multiple data sources to find actionable insights that improve all facets of our business from Employee to Guest to Check. This position will require a player coach that is a detail-oriented thought-starter who can manage multiple projects, people, and deadlines in a fast-paced environment.', 'Nervous about an upcoming interview? Unsure how to write a new resume?', 'Visit the Hays Career Advice section to learn top tips to help you stand out from the crowd when job hunting.']
