job_title: Senior Analyst, Business Analyst, Marketing Analyst
job_text: ['', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', 'The individual should have hands-on knowledge of digital marketing platforms and the ability to combine large customer datasets that will feed into our BI tools.', 'Excellent understanding of digital marketing analytics and strong interest in how it works “under the hood"', 'Create self-service BI solutions - Build data solutions and dashboards that allow end users to answer their most critical marketing questionsBuild best in class datasets – Leverage our ETL tool to build integrated datasets that provide a central view into our clients marketing efforts. Own the ingestion, cleansing and aggregation of those datasetsTranslate Measurement frameworks - Partner with analytics leads, activation and account teams to translate measurement frameworks into interactive dashboard deliverablesAutomate manual reporting - Own the process of data transformation and translating Excel and PPT deliverables into BI solutionsBe a trusted partner - Partner with marketing analytics leaders to create best in class dashboard designs and BI processes. Educate and train analytics and related teams on the benefits of using our BI solution', 'Automate manual reporting - Own the process of data transformation and translating Excel and PPT deliverables into BI solutions', 'We are committed to being an Equal Opportunity employer.\xa0As such, we seek motivated and qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, ethnic or national origin, age, physical or mental disability, genetic information, marital information, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local employment discrimination laws where operates.\xa0We strive to employ, motivate, advance and reasonably accommodate any qualified employees and applicants.\xa0We believe diversity of persons and ideas forms the most comprehensive, forward-looking company.', 'Extensive knowledge and working experience with at least two BI platforms (e.g. DOMO, Tableau, Looker, Microsoft Power BI, etc.)', 'All employees are working remote for the rest of 2020; once the offices re-open, this position can in be in our New York City office, Philadelphia office, or Florham Park, NJ office.', 'Experience in connecting, cleansing and blending data within an ETL or SQL environment', 'Create self-service BI solutions - Build data solutions and dashboards that allow end users to answer their most critical marketing questions', '5+ years of experience developing business intelligence analytics deliverables5-8 years of experience in digital marketing and/or communications analyticsExperience in connecting, cleansing and blending data within an ETL or SQL environmentExtensive knowledge and working experience with at least two BI platforms (e.g. DOMO, Tableau, Looker, Microsoft Power BI, etc.)SQL experience is a mustExcellent understanding of digital marketing analytics and strong interest in how it works “under the hood"', '\xa0', '5+ years of experience developing business intelligence analytics deliverables', 'We offer a comprehensive benefit program and perks, including flexible PTO, expanded paid leave for new parents including a 4th Trimester program that helps new parents transition back to work, and a five-week sabbatical program.\xa0Other perks include Income Protection, Retirement plans/401(k) match, and cell phone savings plans.\xa0', 'Be a trusted partner - Partner with marketing analytics leaders to create best in class dashboard designs and BI processes. Educate and train analytics and related teams on the benefits of using our BI solution', '5-8 years of experience in digital marketing and/or communications analytics', 'Senior Analyst, Business Intelligence, Marketing Analytics', 'Build best in class datasets – Leverage our ETL tool to build integrated datasets that provide a central view into our clients marketing efforts. Own the ingestion, cleansing and aggregation of those datasets', 'Translate Measurement frameworks - Partner with analytics leads, activation and account teams to translate measurement frameworks into interactive dashboard deliverables', 'SQL experience is a must', 'The\xa0Senior Analyst, Business Intelligence, Marketing Analytics\xa0role is a blend of data management, marketing analytics, and business intelligence. This individual will work closely with accounts teams to understand the data they use to drive optimizations and decision making. They will support the delivery of business intelligence solutions by centralizing customer datasets, leveraging ETL processes, and building and designing interactive dashboards and reporting.']

['', '● Salesforce Administrator certification is a plus.', '● Provide guidance and requirements to developers for bug fixes and minor enhancements.', '● Previous experience with incident management or in customer service preferred.', '● Manage queue of incidents and requests reported by the global Customer Support team.', 'BS degree', 'Commitment Level:', 'We are seeking a Customer Care Analyst on a contract basis. We are looking for a collaborative team-player with a “can-do” attitude to join the Global Support Enablement team. As a Customer Care Analyst , you will support the systems and tools used by our growing Customer Support organization, largely powered by Salesforce.com. In this role, you will monitor and manage a queue of reported incidents and requests, partner closely with our Business Technology team to drive resolutions, and regularly update the ticketing system to track progress. We need a self-starter who can learn quickly, drive deliverables, and take pride in ensuring that the customer and analyst experience is kept at the forefront at all times', 'including tracking issues through to resolution and securing end user acceptance sign-off.', '● Leverage business knowledge and expertise to identify opportunities for process or system', 'department to find viable solutions and facilitate resolution of issues.', '● Proficiency with JIRA, Confluence, ServiceNow', '● Customer service-oriented with a demonstrated desire to exceed expectations and the ability to', 'What You’ll Do:', 'Support operation team.', '● Test fixes and new features during user acceptance testing (UAT) of bug fixes or projects;', '● Ability to be flexible, multi-task and get things done in a fast-paced and constantly changing', 'serve multiple customers and deliver an excellent experience.', 'Company Industry:\xa0Technology', 'improvements.', 'Company Industry:', 'Must Haves:', 'Opportunity:', '● Previous experience with Salesforce.com Service Cloud', 'Education:', 'environment', '● Troubleshoot and triage reported system issues and work with the business and the IT', 'Now for the Perks!', 'Hours & Location', 'Our Customer is a software vendor of cloud-based ERP that practices in human capital management and financial management applications. They offer products and services that allow customers to oversee time tracking, procurement, employee data, financial accounting, and expense management at anytime and anywhere. They continue to offer enterprise-level software solutions for financial management, human resources, and planning. Their proven methodology, expertise, community, tools, and education help ensure your organization’s success.', 'M-F, 40 hours/week. This position will be remote until Covid restrictions are lifted. Will be located onsite at our Pleasanton, CA when deemed safer to do so.', '● Excellent interpersonal, collaboration, and problem-solving skills.', 'Opportunity: The Mom Project is helping to source candidates for the above client who is looking for a Customer Care Analyst', 'Commitment Level: 40 hours per week, 99% remote, contract through August 2021', 'Health Benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision, Life (including spouse & child), 401k, STD/LTD, AD&D, and Commuter Benefits program.', '● Learn the case management system in detail and assist with system documentation for the']

['Ithaka S+R is a non-profit research and consulting service. Our growing team offers unique opportunities for your research and project management skills to play a vital role in helping the academic and cultural communities serve the public good and navigate economic, technological, and demographic change.', 'Research and analysisPerform quantitative and qualitative research and analysis, which may take the form of:Collecting and cleaning large datasets from distributed administrative systemsConducting data analyses using descriptive and empirical methods, including quasi-experimental approachesConducting and synthesizing stakeholder interviewsDesigning and administering surveysConducting desk research utilizing public, internal, and partner-provided sources\xa0Analyzing the effects of education-related programs and interventions, such as state and federal policies, and a broad range of higher education student success initiativesProvide logistical support for research, analysis, and strategic advising efforts, such as maintaining data, arranging interviews, managing relationships, and utilizing survey management and data analysis tools.', 'Contribute to the creation of compelling reports and presentations of research findings and recommendations.', 'Proficiency in a statistical analysis software (Stata preferred).', 'We are hiring for multiple Analyst roles within the Educational Transformation program, which studies and supports the adoption and scaling of policies, practices, and innovations that improve student postsecondary access and success. Write emails, memos, and briefs to clearly communicate concepts and processes to internal and external stakeholders.Contribute to the creation of compelling reports and presentations of research findings and recommendations.Represent Ithaka S+R at conferences, networking events, and partner meetings.', 'In this role, you will collaborate with colleagues on cutting edge projects such as the American Talent Initiative (www.americantalentinitiative.org); evaluations of data-informed student success interventions, online and adaptive learning, and college leadership training; equity-focused research on student debt, innovations in student and institutional financing of higher education, student veterans access and success, and higher education in prisons; and state and federal education policy analysis. Analysts contribute to multiple concurrent projects with ambitious deadlines, and are responsible for high-quality, on-time completion of tasks such as desk research, assisting in data collection and analysis, report drafting, and project management. Although the Analyst role is the junior role on our team, you will have significant, substantive responsibility, working with a variety of prominent and experienced colleagues, leaders, and researchers, managing their inputs and helping produce high-quality deliverables that have an impact on the field.\xa0', 'Support the development of detailed project proposals and research plans.', 'Conducting desk research utilizing public, internal, and partner-provided sources\xa0', 'Provide logistical support for research, analysis, and strategic advising efforts, such as maintaining data, arranging interviews, managing relationships, and utilizing survey management and data analysis tools.', 'Organize and participate in brainstorming sessions to generate ideas and discuss project strategy.', 'Strong interpersonal skills.', 'Collecting and cleaning large datasets from distributed administrative systemsConducting data analyses using descriptive and empirical methods, including quasi-experimental approachesConducting and synthesizing stakeholder interviewsDesigning and administering surveysConducting desk research utilizing public, internal, and partner-provided sources\xa0Analyzing the effects of education-related programs and interventions, such as state and federal policies, and a broad range of higher education student success initiatives', 'Conducting and synthesizing stakeholder interviews', 'OtherHelp develop strong relationships with internal and external partners.Organize and participate in brainstorming sessions to generate ideas and discuss project strategy.Support the development of detailed project proposals and research plans.Maintain awareness of major issues in higher education that may impact our projects.When COVID-19 related travel restrictions are no longer in place, some travel required for research, reporting, and representation purposes - approximately 5-10% (or 10-15% if your permanent location is outside of the New York area).', 'Undergraduate or graduate training in a field that requires strong writing and quantitative analysis skills or equivalent experience and skills.', 'Designing and administering surveys', 'Conducting data analyses using descriptive and empirical methods, including quasi-experimental approaches']

This includes hands-on work and operation on our Linear Generator prototypes and test system, debugging, and advanced data analysis aimed at improving our product. This position is within the test engineer team with a strong focus on exploring our diverse stream of data to extract insights about performance and durability of our units, and will require strong collaboration with the software team that is developing architecture and infrastructure of our software systems. ', 'and software engineering with activities that will include:', 'The unique combination of attributes offered by Mainspring’s linear generator enables applications on both the customer and utility sides of the meter for the $750B global electricity equipment market. job_title: Scientific Information Analyst - Biological Sciences Required
job_text: ['·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Competent in Microsoft Excel', 'The Scientific Information Analyst provides technical assistance to support accurate reporting of categorized research data to various groups as part of the NIH mission. The Scientific Information Analyst ("Analyst") analyzes technical, scientific, and health-related information using a text mining system. The analyst maintains the accuracy a variety of existing category definitions and works with the tool to produce project listing. The SIA will facilitate consensus on the boundaries of categories with subject matter experts. This position involves detailed work with NIH grant proposals, use of thesaurus-based natural language processing tools, documentation and data management, as well as collaboration with the team members and scientific experts at NIH’s scientific centers.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Highly organized and deadline-driven; able to multi-task', 'Requirements', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exemplary communication skills', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Able to produce results within a collaborative environment', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Degree in a biomedical, biological sciences or allied health services field; able to comprehend and discuss technical health sciences and biomedical literature', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience facilitating or leading scientific meetings for individuals across all levels of scientific knowledge (novice-expert)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Preferred skills: Working knowledge of scientific thesaurus or other structured vocabularies and text mining tools and software.', 'The Analyst will provide technical presentations and demonstrations of data analyses and conclusions. He/she develops and presents reports on funding by research category, and responds to special data requests. He/she makes suggestions to improve text mining performance and processes using critical thinking and evidence-based research (e.g., suggestions for improvements to the thesaurus, concept normalization, or natural language processing).', '\xa0']

['', 'Maintain CRM data quality at the highest level to support ongoing decision-making.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Our client, a rapidly growing non-profit organization is looking for a\xa0Sales Operation Analyst to join their team! The Sales Operations Analyst will help support our Sales and Customer Success team with lead campaign management, data governance, sales compensation, Hubspot reporting and sales enablement with user administration tasks including access management, permission sets, role assignments, uploads, etc.\xa0The Sales Operations Analyst will keep the lead generation arm of the business running smoothly, enhance ongoing running of reports, and automate processes as necessary.\xa0', 'Contribute to monthly sales commission process while working with Sales Finance teams.', 'Provide comprehensive funnel analysis and management that helps drive informed decisions that improve the sales process and help grow the business. Highlight trends and opportunities.', 'Provide custom reporting, metrics, and data analysis, as required (i.e. revenue by year, spend by product, dashboards, etc.). Partner with internal business teams for data compilation and execution.Provide comprehensive funnel analysis and management that helps drive informed decisions that improve the sales process and help grow the business. Highlight trends and opportunities.Participate in the on-boarding process relative to new user set-up, account assignment, CRM.Systems and tools training, rules of engagement, sales support infrastructure education, etc.Work directly with sales directors to achieve sales goals by providing timely sales analytics including pipeline analysis, forecasting and sales results.', 'Experience successfully managing analytically rigorous corporate initiatives.', 'Demonstrated ability to design and implement sales processes and infrastructure.', 'Qualifications: ', 'Systems and tools training, rules of engagement, sales support infrastructure education, etc.', 'Sales Operations Analyst', 'Respond to Ad-Hoc data analysis requests from senior sales leadership team as needed.', 'Participate in the on-boarding process relative to new user set-up, account assignment, CRM.', 'Deep experience with Business Intelligence (BI) applications (Power BI, or fanatical Excel user).', '3+ years’ experience in sales operations, business planning, or sales support management roles.', 'Expert proficiency in CRM.', '3+ years’ experience in sales operations, business planning, or sales support management roles.Experience successfully managing analytically rigorous corporate initiatives.Expert proficiency in CRM.Deep experience with Business Intelligence (BI) applications (Power BI, or fanatical Excel user).Demonstrated ability to design and implement sales processes and infrastructure.Experience with cross-functional collaboration with Finance, Marketing, and IT.4-year business degree, or equivalent experience. Preference for a background in economics, statistics, or finance.', 'Produce ongoing and regular reports on sales metrics including but not limited to sales effectiveness, competitive win/loss result, and other key sales metrics.', 'Create and manage Hubspot dashboards and other ad-hoc reports for the sales organization.', '4-year business degree, or equivalent experience. Thank you ***', 'Collect business data, interpret, and analyze, summarize/report findings.', 'Type of data is inventory, shipments, customer serv results, sku analysis.', 'The work that needs to be covered is induced by the sustained increase in consumption of Home Care products since the start of COVID 19 that has caused the nearly 100% of the business to be on Allocation.Work includes but is not limited to, tracking Canada shipments vs BOP, tracking US Shipments vs BOP, leading interventions to ensure we move enough product to Canada, leading weekly Allocation prioritization data collection and summary, daily/ weekly inventory, service, production, shipment reporting, updating source reports for Power BI, creating new analytics tools to help streamline allocation work processes.Collect business data, interpret, and analyze, summarize/report findings.Communication to broader groups is a requirement.Type of data is inventory, shipments, customer serv results, sku analysis.Strong proficiency in MS, (Excel, PP- must), SAP (SPI and Brandcode look up/reference), Power BI or other data analytics tools is beneficial. ', 'Communication to broader groups is a requirement.', 'Work includes but is not limited to, tracking Canada shipments vs BOP, tracking US Shipments vs BOP, leading interventions to ensure we move enough product to Canada, leading weekly Allocation prioritization data collection and summary, daily/ weekly inventory, service, production, shipment reporting, updating source reports for Power BI, creating new analytics tools to help streamline allocation work processes.', 'The work that needs to be covered is induced by the sustained increase in consumption of Home Care products since the start of COVID 19 that has caused the nearly 100% of the business to be on Allocation.', 'Strong proficiency in MS, (Excel, PP- must), SAP (SPI and Brandcode look up/reference), Power BI or other data analytics tools is beneficial. ']

["If this job is a match for your background, we would be honored to receive your application!\xa0\xa0Providing consulting opportunities to TALENTed people since 1987, we offer a host of opportunities including contract, contract to hire and permanent placement. Let's talk!", 'Requesting someone with client experience in SAP, BW, Power BI, Tableau, Infopage.', 'The work that needs to be covered is induced by the sustained increase in consumption of Home Care products since the start of COVID 19 that has caused the nearly 100% of the business to be on Allocation. Work includes but is not limited to, tracking Canada shipments vs BOP, tracking US Shipments vs BOP, leading interventions to ensure we move enough product to Canada, leading weekly Allocation prioritization data collection and summary, daily/ weekly inventory, service, production, shipment reporting, Updating source reports for Power BI, creating new analytics tools to help streamline allocation work processes.', 'BUSINESS ANALYSTJob Summary: Talent Software Services is in search of a Business Analyst for a contract position in Cincinnati, OH. Opportunity will be three months with a strong chance for a long-term extension.Primary Responsibilities/Accountabilities:', 'Requesting someone with client experience in SAP, BW, Power BI, Tableau, Infopage.The work that needs to be covered is induced by the sustained increase in consumption of Home Care products since the start of COVID 19 that has caused the nearly 100% of the business to be on Allocation. Work includes but is not limited to, tracking Canada shipments vs BOP, tracking US Shipments vs BOP, leading interventions to ensure we move enough product to Canada, leading weekly Allocation prioritization data collection and summary, daily/ weekly inventory, service, production, shipment reporting, Updating source reports for Power BI, creating new analytics tools to help streamline allocation work processes.Collect business data, interpret and analyze, summarize/report findings. Communication to broader groups is a requirement. Type of data is inventory, shipments, customer serv results, sku analysis . Strong proficiency in MS, (Excel, PP- must), SAP (SPI and Brandcode look up/reference), Power BI or other data analytics tools is beneficial.', 'Collect business data, interpret and analyze, summarize/report findings. Communication to broader groups is a requirement. Type of data is inventory, shipments, customer serv results, sku analysis . Strong proficiency in MS, (Excel, PP- must), SAP (SPI and Brandcode look up/reference), Power BI or other data analytics tools is beneficial.']

['', 'New to state civil service employees are typically hired at the minimum of the salary range.Salaries do not reflect recent changes necessitated by the unanticipated budget shortfalls arising from the COVID-19 pandemic.\xa0Effective July 1, 2020, through June 30, 2022, this position is subject to a base pay salary reduction of 9.23% in exchange for 16 hours of Personal Leave Credits per month.', 'Do you enjoy researching and analyzing data to uncover the story behind the numbers? Are you incredibly detail-oriented with experience supporting and presenting to executive leadership? If this sounds like you, Covered California has an exciting new career opportunity and we want you to join our team!', 'Desirable Qualifications', 'Demonstrated capacity to prepare compelling results of analysis for executives,\xa0stakeholders, and decision-makers through data visualizations, writing, and presentations.Highly detail-oriented, innovative, organized, and consistently acts in the utmost professional manner.Experience as, or comparable to, an Executive Assistant; working closely with and supporting mid-level management up to senior leadership.Familiarity and experience working with state government and health care associated agencies and departments, as well as knowledge of health care data analysis is preferred, but not a requirement.', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'https://hbex.coveredca.com/careers/benefits/', 'elizabeth.mosley@covered.ca.gov.', 'Join the Covered California team!\xa0', 'Familiarity and experience working with state government and health care associated agencies and departments, as well as knowledge of health care data analysis is preferred, but not a requirement.', 'PATTERN 2', 'At Covered California, we recognize our employees are our most valuable asset. Our employees are the vital link that ensures that our vision, mission, and values are fully realized. We have a variety of career fields that help make a difference in the lives of Californians, and we’re looking for talented and enthusiastic individuals to join our team.', 'New to state civil service employees are typically hired at the minimum of the salary range.', 'Minimum Qualifications\xa0', '\xa0', 'Employee Benefits', 'Highly detail-oriented, innovative, organized, and consistently acts in the utmost professional manner.', 'AND', 'Demonstrated capacity to prepare compelling results of analysis for executives,\xa0stakeholders, and decision-makers through data visualizations, writing, and presentations.', 'Covered California is currently hiring a Clinical Operations Analyst to support our Chief Medical Officer, as well as the mission-oriented work of the Population Care and Quality Improvement units, and the Clinical team. The Clinical Operations Analyst will contribute to the Clinical Operations team policy and operational decision-making and will perform research tasks such as problem definition and exploration, collection and interpretation of data, and reporting of documented findings. This role is also involved in developing and presenting recommendations to management, in addition to other Covered California program areas.', 'Note: ', "The Executive Office/Clinical Operations Division is responsible for clinical strategy, medical policy, medical management, and other clinical operations to continuously improve the health services provided by health plans contracted by Covered California and promote improvement in California’s delivery system. The Clinical Operations Division's Quality Improvement unit, Population Care unit, and clinical team are responsible for developing program policies to implement health care equity, quality improvement strategies, and ensure an effective health care delivery system.", 'The classification for this role is an Associate Governmental Program Analyst (AGPA).', 'One year of experience performing the duties of a Staff Services Analyst, Range C.', 'Equivalent to graduation from college. (Additional qualifying experience may be substituted for the required education on a year-for-year basis.)\xa0\xa0', 'Covered California provides incredible benefits for our employees, including healthcare, retirement and savings, work-life services, leave benefits, and work-life balance. To learn more, copy and paste this link into your browser: https://hbex.coveredca.com/careers/benefits/', 'Salaries do not reflect recent changes necessitated by the unanticipated budget shortfalls arising from the COVID-19 pandemic.\xa0Effective July 1, 2020, through June 30, 2022, this position is subject to a base pay salary reduction of 9.23% in exchange for 16 hours of Personal Leave Credits per month.', 'EITHER -\xa0PATTERN 1', 'OR -\xa0PATTERN 2', 'If you have any questions regarding the application process and/or are interested in learning more about this position, please contact elizabeth.mosley@covered.ca.gov.', 'Application Deadline: 3/15/2021 @ 11:59 pm PST', 'PATTERN 1', 'Three years of professional analytical experience performing duties in one or a combination of the following or closely related areas: budgeting, management analysis, personnel, planning, program evaluation, or policy analysis.', 'Experience as, or comparable to, an Executive Assistant; working closely with and supporting mid-level management up to senior leadership.']

['', 'SAS and/or SQL - Must be proficient with data collection from data warehouse, data marts or external datasets, and related data analysis methodologies', 'Must consistently manage expectations and deliver projects according to strict timelines in a highly collaborative environment', 'Preferred Experience:', 'The Analyst serves as an organizational resource for market analyses and strategic planning support. Work includes both reporting and standardized analyses, as well as ad-hoc “as needed” requests from division leadership. Key areas of focus include market segmentation, product and channel performance and overall market opportunity insights.\xa0', 'Able to summarize findings and create presentation style ready responses to reporting requests', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Intelligence & Analytics, Finance, Statistics, or Health Care Analytics\xa03+ years of experience in the field', 'As part of the Business Strategy & Data Analytics team, the Analyst will be responsible for technical design, development, and implementation of complex reporting mechanisms. The incumbent manages both recurring (monthly/quarterly) and ad hoc data/information processes as well as report development and analysis across multiple functions. The Analyst has a command of descriptive and diagnostic analytics as well as skills in predictive analytics and modeling that inform business and market strategy.\xa0', 'Ciber is looking for a strong Healthcare Systems Analyst to join our practice in Minneapolis - working remote.', 'Able to analyze and interpret results using a variety of analytical and presentation tools that include Excel, PowerPoint, and Qlik', 'Able to independently collect data, organize, analyze and deliver interpretation in response to both recurring and ad hoc reporting requests from a BIG data environment', '\xa0', 'Education:', 'Working with market data in support of product evaluations, new segmentation, and new market development', 'We offer full salaries, great benefits and tons of Ciber perks!', '3+ years of experience in the field', 'Familiarity with healthcare related data or sources such as health management, population health, population demographics, geospatial data, etc.', 'Health Insurance experience, specific to Government Programs (Medicare and Medicaid)Able to independently collect data, organize, analyze and deliver interpretation in response to both recurring and ad hoc reporting requests from a BIG data environmentSAS and/or SQL - Must be proficient with data collection from data warehouse, data marts or external datasets, and related data analysis methodologiesAble to analyze and interpret results using a variety of analytical and presentation tools that include Excel, PowerPoint, and QlikAble to summarize findings and create presentation style ready responses to reporting requestsMust consistently manage expectations and deliver projects according to strict timelines in a highly collaborative environment', 'Required Experience', 'Tableau, Qlikview and Salesforce and/or Dynamics', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Intelligence & Analytics, Finance, Statistics, or Health Care Analytics\xa0', 'Description:', 'Health Insurance experience, specific to Government Programs (Medicare and Medicaid)', 'Analyzing Customer Relationship Management results and creation of advanced Sales reporting', 'Familiarity with healthcare related data or sources such as health management, population health, population demographics, geospatial data, etc.Analyzing Customer Relationship Management results and creation of advanced Sales reportingWorking with market data in support of product evaluations, new segmentation, and new market developmentTableau, Qlikview and Salesforce and/or Dynamics']

['', '8+ years of experience.', 'Responsible for analysis and evaluation of user business problems and development of system recommendations to meet requirements. Translates high-level business requirements into functional specifications for business application development. Interviews end users to obtain and document the detailed business requirements for projects. Assists in the business process redesign and documentation as needed for new technology. Combines understanding of IT and business processes to recommend solutions. Assignments typically include problem definition, evaluation of requirements, and implementation of systems to meet business and user requirements. Experience developing use cases, use case model, supplementary requirements, and business rules is essential. Strong knowledge of MS Project, Excel, MS Word and Visio Drawing tool along with general familiarity with Outlook and other MS Office applications is also required. Excellent analytical skills and communication skills required. ', 'Job Description:']

', '5+ years’ experience in roles that required in-depth use of analytical techniques applied in a supply chain environment.', 'Strong, hands-on experience with SAP in a supply chain environment is preferred. Experience with other big-ERP systems will be considered.', 'The location for this role is flexible, with the understanding that the position will involve some travel and work outside of normal business hours to support global teams in their local time zones. Travel is not expected to exceed 10% on a normal basis. Preferred home locations include ATG offices in Charlotte (NC), Lexington (near Colombia, SC), Sparks (near Baltimore, MD), or Apex (near Raleigh/Durham, NC).', 'Prepare and present effective presentations to convey complex topics to system users as well as to key business leaders.', 'Excellent relationship management with the ability to work effectively across business units and functions within a matrixed organization.', 'Outstanding presentation skills and the ability to express complex concepts in a clear and concise manner.', 'Develop and automate reports, dashboards, decision support, and any other analysis needed to support global business.', 'The selected candidate will work closely with business stakeholders to employ analytical skills and drive data based decision making; fostering a data driven culture within Apex Tool Group. This includes enhancing the distribution of data through report building, supporting business decisions by performing statistical analysis, and streamlining business activities through robotic process automation.', 'Advanced proficiency with Tableau is preferred but strong experience with other data visualization programs will be considered.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain, Engineering, Statistics, Economics, Mathematics or a related business field preferred.5+ years’ experience in roles that required in-depth use of analytical techniques applied in a supply chain environment.Advanced proficiency with Tableau is preferred but strong experience with other data visualization programs will be considered.Experience with scripting and automation through programs like Alteryx and/or languages such as Python, R, Visual Basic, or Powershell is preferred but not required.High level of attention to detail with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, adjusting priorities as needed to meet deadlines.Strong, hands-on experience with SAP in a supply chain environment is preferred. This will require working closely with Content Partnership Leads and FP&A. ', ' Ad Hoc Analysis: Sourcing and manipulating large data sets of content partner usage and revenue performance to create clear and actionable analysis for internal review and rapid decision making ', ' Excellent communication and presentation skills - be able to handle and synthesize large datasets to deliver critical insights in an easy-to-digest format for management and external partners ', 'Ad Hoc Analysis: ', 'Responsibilities Include', ' A willingness and quick ability to learn new software ', 'Financial Analysis:', ' Business Model development and Forecasting abilities ', 'Reporting and Dashboards: ', ' Ability to work independently in a fast-paced environment ', ' Revenue Forecasts: Working with Content Partner account leads to handle priority accounts and to run revenue forecast models against existing business. Additionally, developing financial modeling forecasts for new, prospective content partners using internal metrics to support. ', ' Basic SQL proficiency (is a plus) ', ' Content Operations Costs: Collaborating with Content Operations to develop a seamless process to track, summarize and recoup overage costs, track expenses and payouts, and assist the content organization with their day-to-day financial operations including purchase orders. ', 'Additional Qualifications', ' Strong written & verbal communication skills particularly with external partners or clients', ' Advanced Microsoft Office suite skills, particularly Excel and Powerpoint ', ' Reporting and Dashboards: Augmenting existing revenue reporting processes to ensure accurate and timely partner reporting. Collaborating with the Business Intelligence and FP&A teams to craft, improve and manage revenue dashboards, monitor business performance, analyze business drivers, and provide meaningful insights and visualization of important metrics. ', 'About The Brand', ' Exceptional financial modeling and analytical skills ', ' Reporting and Dashboards: Augmenting existing revenue reporting processes to ensure accurate and timely partner reporting. Collaborating with the Business Intelligence and FP&A teams to craft, improve and manage revenue dashboards, monitor business performance, analyze business drivers, and provide meaningful insights and visualization of important metrics.  Revenue Forecasts: Working with Content Partner account leads to handle priority accounts and to run revenue forecast models against existing business. Additionally, developing financial modeling forecasts for new, prospective content partners using internal metrics to support.  Financial Analysis: Developing business models, forecasts, and recommendations based on findings. Providing detailed monthly and quarterly financial overviews to management. Participating and supporting in delivering results and presentations to partners.  Content Operations Costs: Collaborating with Content Operations to develop a seamless process to track, summarize and recoup overage costs, track expenses and payouts, and assist the content organization with their day-to-day financial operations including purchase orders.  Business Planning: Generating recurring financial and KPI forecasts for each partner based on context, analyzing progress toward KPI targets, and making recommendations to senior and executive leadership on meeting or exceeding targets based on the Operating Plan. If data currently not available as needed, documents user requests for data and then, using alternate sources, finds the data and pulls it together using Excel and Pivot Tables to present back to the user.Provides support and technical assistance to health centers and other departments as needed.', 'Excellent organizational and time management skills, strong attention to detail, high regard for accuracy and quality work.', 'Oversee and present data models, reporting solutions and other projects to management and stakeholders in a concise and professional manner.', 'Demonstrated proficiency in Electronic Practice Management (EPM) and Electronic Health Records (EHR). ', 'Provides support and technical assistance to health centers and other departments as needed.', 'Planned Parenthood Northern California', 'Other Skills, Abilities, Qualifications', 'Deliver accurate and complete information under strict deadlines.', 'Essential Duties And Responsibilities', 'Work with IT resources to implement data storage, retrieval, and metric implementation in the data warehouse.', 'Assists in creation and maintenance of data documentation. ', 'Assist internal staff and clients in the interpretation of data and reports.', 'Ability to work productively, autonomously and under limited supervision. Ability to work well independently and as a collaborative team member.', 'Participates in the testing and identifying changes to EPIC and legacy systems as part of the upgrade process. Keeps track of tested scenarios and results in test logs and reports those findings. Works with Director to identify required changes to current reporting and processing, and then tests those changes.', 'Excellent communication and critical thinking and problem-solving skills.', 'Set up standardized self-serve and subscription based clinical reporting to support our clinical and operational leaders’ oversight of our direct care clinical programs, including the impact of our clinical interventions. This work entails analysis within our own data warehouse as well as the use of third-party vendor data aggregation tools. Responsible for reporting and ensuring success metrics and quickly fine-tuning data reporting.', 'Demonstrated proficiency in Electronic Practice Management (EPM) and Electronic Health Records (EHR). Displays strong initiative and can establish personal goals and take responsibility for meeting them within defined timelines.Professional, customer-service oriented attitude and demeanor.Excellent organizational and time management skills, strong attention to detail, high regard for accuracy and quality work.Effective and creative problem-solver with strong initiative and excellent follow-through.Excellent communication and critical thinking and problem-solving skills.Ability to work productively, autonomously and under limited supervision. Ability to work well independently and as a collaborative team member.Demonstrated success managing and executing multiple priorities and projects based on business needs.Ability to work well under pressure and successfully meet deadlines. Ability to be effective and flexible in stressful situations (i.e., unexpected problems, tight deadlines).Commitment to quality health care.', 'Work closely with clinical leadership to explore care improvement opportunities through improved patient data acquisition, curation and sharing.', 'Conceptualize, design, and conduct new processes for internal and customer data visualization and reporting and ad-hoc analytics.', 'Prefer experience with health information systems and clinical informatics.', '1+ year curriculum design and training delivery', '2+ years Healthcare Operations (clinical, business or education)', "Demonstrates professionalism, respect, and accountability for proper performance of assigned duties, and to the principles of the organization Mission and Values Statement. Provides a level of leadership and communication for the department that is consistent with the expectations of the organization.Basic Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Healthcare, Informatics, Business Analytics, Information Systems, or experience/alternative degree considered in lieu of education.3+ years’ experience with SQL along with knowledge of relational databases, data warehouses, and data management principles. Working knowledge of enterprise data tools and technologies and analytics techniques & technologies (statistical modeling, Data Lakes, Data Warehouse, etc.) and experience developing dashboards and advanced reports.Experience must include a solid understanding of the data and analytics functions, operating models and supporting organization structures, and process best practices.Minimum of two years of combined data, analytics, or strategic consulting experience.Preferred Qualifications2+ years Healthcare Operations (clinical, business or education)1+ year Healthcare technology environment1+ year curriculum design and training deliveryPrefer experience with health information systems and clinical informatics.", 'Effective and creative problem-solver with strong initiative and excellent follow-through.', 'Basic Qualifications:', 'Provide subject matter expertise to help engineers understand HIT source systems and translate clinical requirements into specifications that assure that our applications provide timely, accurate and actionable information to clinical end-users.', 'Displays strong initiative and can establish personal goals and take responsibility for meeting them within defined timelines.', 'Create and publish routine visualizations and reporting and ad hoc reporting, as assigned.', 'EDUCATION And/or EXPERIENCE', 'Demonstrates professionalism, respect, and accountability for proper performance of assigned duties, and to the principles of the organization Mission and Values Statement. Provides a level of leadership and communication for the department that is consistent with the expectations of the organization.', "Bachelor's degree in Healthcare, Informatics, Business Analytics, Information Systems, or experience/alternative degree considered in lieu of education.", 'Demonstrated success managing and executing multiple priorities and projects based on business needs.', 'Helps others identify best source for requested data and walks the end user through the steps required to get the data. If data currently not available as needed, documents user requests for data and then, using alternate sources, finds the data and pulls it together using Excel and Pivot Tables to present back to the user.', 'Commitment to quality health care.', 'Analyze, mine, map, transform, and transfer large volumes of data across data sources.', 'Conduct analysis of administrative and clinical data to generate performance metrics.', 'Support and participate in business development activities, as needed.', 'Supervise, mentor, and assess performance of junior-level analysts, as requested.', '1+ year Healthcare technology environment', 'Professional, customer-service oriented attitude and demeanor.', 'Responsible for facilitating communication from the clinical end users across the patient care departments while working collaboratively and directly with the vendors and the IT Department.', 'Experience must include a solid understanding of the data and analytics functions, operating models and supporting organization structures, and process best practices.', '3+ years’ experience with SQL along with knowledge of relational databases, data warehouses, and data management principles. ']

['', 'About the Role', 'Create and review proposals with key stakeholders to roll out reporting solution quickly to meet our client’s needs', 'Work with clients and internal stakeholders to understand reporting needs, gather requirements, and develop use cases for new product offeringsRapidly develop reporting beta’s for testing and identify which is most viable and scalableDevelop custom datasets using data lake to power new analytics and reporting betasCreate and review proposals with key stakeholders to roll out reporting solution quickly to meet our client’s needs', 'Free parking and on-site fitness center with locker rooms', 'Proven analytical skillset with ability to derive insights out of large datasets and present findings in an appropriately detailed manner', 'Work across data science and data engineering to develop client datasets that will power reporting', '401k match program', 'Flexible paid vacation policy401k match programFree parking and on-site fitness center with locker roomsSabbatical programCharitable giving via our time and a financial match programShenanigan’s day', 'Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau or Google Data Studio to create client facing reporting', 'Deep analysis through data visualization tools is a critical part of marketers understanding complex datasets and maximizing their marketing investment. On the data visualization team, this candidate will help design, develop, and rollout analytics solutions that help marketers do their jobs every day. Candidate will be on the frontline of implementing both our internal analytics platform and the flagship product at Ovative – MAP. The candidate will get hands on training and experience working with advanced analytics tools/technologies such as SQL, Tableau, GitHub, and more.', 'Flexible paid vacation policy', 'Develop the reporting user interface for clients to digest the advanced analytical outputs produced by our MAP platform', 'Culture matters and we’ve been recognized as a Top Workplace three-years running because of it. We demand trust and transparency from each other. We believe in doing the hard and complicated work others put off. We’re open in communication and floor plan. We’re flat – our interns sit next to VPs, our analysts work closely with senior leaders, and our CEO interacts with every single person daily. Put together, these elements help foster an environment where smart people can support each other in performing to their highest potential.', 'A base knowledge of statistics', 'We provide strong, competitive, holistic benefits that understand the importance of your life inside and out of work', 'Work across data science and data engineering to develop client datasets that will power reportingDevelop the reporting user interface for clients to digest the advanced analytical outputs produced by our MAP platformContinue to provide thought leadership on how to improve the frontend user experience, data storytelling, and create efficiencies', 'Develop custom datasets using data lake to power new analytics and reporting betas', 'Preferred:', 'Work with internal business teams to deploy and enhance our existing solutions that power our media teams reporting and analyticsProvide valuable input through critical thinking around how to create efficiencies and drive profitability', 'Tangible amenities we enjoy:', 'Sabbatical program', 'Working at Ovative won’t be easy, but if you like getting your hands dirty, driving results, and being surrounded by the best talent, it’ll be the most rewarding job you’ll ever have. If you think you can make us better, we want to hear from you!', 'Develop Analytics Products and Tools', 'BA / BS in marketing, statistics, MIS, or relevant field', '1-3 years of experience in the reporting, data, and/or analytics spaceBA / BS in marketing, statistics, MIS, or relevant fieldProven analytical skillset with ability to derive insights out of large datasets and present findings in an appropriately detailed mannerExperience with data visualization tools like Tableau or Google Data Studio to create client facing reportingStrong technical acumen and desire to work within a technical environmentExcellent organization skills and ability to manage multiple projects and deadlinesAbility to work with technical and business teams – including presenting technical requirements to non-technical audiences', 'Experience with advanced marketing return methodologies such as Multi-Touch Attribution and Media Mix Modeling', 'Key driver on implementations of Ovative’s proprietary Marketing Analytics Platform (MAP)', 'About Ovative Group', 'Excellent organization skills and ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines', 'Power and scale Ovative’s internal reporting platform', 'Experience writing SQL queries to develop datasets', 'The right candidate for this position has a passion for data & analytics, critical problem solving, and design thinking. This person will need to have exceptional communication and organization skills as the role involves managing many projects at once on a growing, fast-paced team.\xa0', 'Benefits of working at Ovative Group', 'Shenanigan’s day', 'Responsibilities of a Data Visualization Senior Analyst', 'Work with internal business teams to deploy and enhance our existing solutions that power our media teams reporting and analytics', 'Culture:', 'We strive to hire and retain the best talent in the Twin Cities. Paying fair, competitive compensation, with a large bonus incentive, and phenomenal health insurance is an important part of this mix. We’re rewarded fairly and when the company performs well, we all benefit.', 'Rapidly develop reporting beta’s for testing and identify which is most viable and scalable', 'Charitable giving via our time and a financial match program', 'Strong technical acumen and desire to work within a technical environment', 'Ovative Group is one of the only firms in the country uniting strategy, media, and measurement under one roof to drive enterprise results. Our teams work together to drive business impact for clients such as General Mills, United Healthcare, Lane Bryant, Facebook, and more. Recognized six consecutive years on Star Tribune’s list of Top 150 Workplaces and the past two years on Inc.5000’s list of the fastest growing private companies in America, we pride ourselves in always overdelivering for our clients, our teams, and our communities.', 'Work with clients and internal stakeholders to understand reporting needs, gather requirements, and develop use cases for new product offerings', 'Requirements:', 'Digital agency or digital marketing experience', 'Continue to provide thought leadership on how to improve the frontend user experience, data storytelling, and create efficiencies', 'Experience writing SQL queries to develop datasetsDigital agency or digital marketing experienceExperience with advanced marketing return methodologies such as Multi-Touch Attribution and Media Mix ModelingA base knowledge of statistics', 'Provide valuable input through critical thinking around how to create efficiencies and drive profitability', 'Compensation and insurance:', 'Ability to work with technical and business teams – including presenting technical requirements to non-technical audiences', '1-3 years of experience in the reporting, data, and/or analytics space']

['', 'Coordinate communication with production facilities, raw material providers and other stakeholders in the supply chain ', 'Experience with an ERP Program (Sage MAS preferred) ', 'Annual performance bonus ', '\xa0 ', 'Solicit and analyze historic demand data from new customers Determine appropriate adjustments in inventory levels and stocking programs to meet customer requirements Coordinate upload of new par levels, annual usage, etc. to company software systems Coordinate communication with production facilities, raw material providers and other stakeholders in the supply chain Negotiate pricing, terms and lead times with production facilities Ongoing management of large scale purchasing initiatives to prepare for customer onboarding Routine purchasing of inventory Regularly look at company purchasing patterns and make adjustments based on trends Managing delivery dates and ensuring production facility compliance with lead times Assistance with receipts of products into inventory management software Assistance with purchasing-related quality assurance functions as dictated by the FDA Devise and implement a scalable supply chain management process to optimize inventory levels on an ongoing basis Communication with customer service and warehouse teams to ensure timely receipt and shipment of product ', 'Detail orientation ', 'Required Skill Set: ', 'Self-direction, independence and leadership ', 'Demonstrated interest in business, entrepreneurship and healthcare ', 'Excellent organizational and task-management skills ', 'Communication with customer service and warehouse teams to ensure timely receipt and shipment of product ', 'Coordinate upload of new par levels, annual usage, etc. to company software systems ', 'Solicit and analyze historic demand data from new customers ', 'Ongoing management of large scale purchasing initiatives to prepare for customer onboarding ', 'Required Skill Set:', '10 days of paid vacation and 3 personal days; 1 additional day of paid vacation with each year of tenure, up to 5 additional days ', 'Bachelor’s degree 2+ years of relevant experience in purchasing, analysis and/or supply chain Demonstrated interest in business, entrepreneurship and healthcare Comfort with data analytics and modeling Superb project and analysis planning skills Strong oral and written communication skills High degree of proficiency with advanced analysis and functions in Excel Experience with an ERP Program (Sage MAS preferred) Excellent organizational and task-management skills Comfort with aggressive supplier management and follow up Professional attitude and outlook Punctuality and reliability Detail orientation Innovativeness and resourcefulness Self-direction, independence and leadership ', 'Novo is small but fast-growing, and this role is designed to give a highly capable candidate a strong sense of supply chain and managing customer demand in a startup company environment. At Novo Surgical, we look for people that will thrive in this environment – one where roles aren’t always well-defined, taking initiative is expected, resourcefulness is required and the collective unit is more important than individual achievement. We also are big on having fun at work and believe that happiness is the key to running a quality company. Medical device companies often have the stereotype of being large, unwieldy bureaucracies, but that is certainly not us. ', 'Primary Duties:', 'Managing delivery dates and ensuring production facility compliance with lead times ', 'Full-time ', 'Compensation & Benefits: ', 'Professional attitude and outlook ', 'Assistance with purchasing-related quality assurance functions as dictated by the FDA ', 'Strong oral and written communication skills ', 'Novo Surgical is seeking a full-time, highly capable supply chain analyst and buyer to help manage inventory and production in accordance with rapidly scaling customer demand. The company is in a growth phase and is regularly onboarding new customers, each with a unique product mix and demand profile. Thus, demand forecasting and adjusting inventory levels and stocking programs in accordance with customer requirements is a highly dynamic process that needs a strong resource to effectively manage. The analyst will work alongside senior management and purchasing personnel to ensure new customers experience seamless deliveries of products. The analyst will engage with many stakeholders, including customers, sales representatives and production facilities. Directives for the analyst will often be high level and he/she will create and manage project plans and adhere to deadlines independently. The role will also include routine buying and regular communication with production to ensure timely delivery of product and to ensure customers are informed of product delivery. ', 'Full-time Annual performance bonus 50% contribution to individual or family health plans offered by company 10 days of paid vacation and 3 personal days; 1 additional day of paid vacation with each year of tenure, up to 5 additional days Role located at the company’s corporate office in Oakbrook, IL', 'High degree of proficiency with advanced analysis and functions in Excel ', 'Punctuality and reliability ', 'Assistance with receipts of products into inventory management software ', 'Negotiate pricing, terms and lead times with production facilities ', 'Routine purchasing of inventory ', 'Innovativeness and resourcefulness ', 'Comfort with aggressive supplier management and follow up ', 'Comfort with data analytics and modeling ', '2+ years of relevant experience in purchasing, analysis and/or supply chain ', 'An ideal candidate for the role should possess the following: a strong intuitive business sense, superb analytical skills and facility with data analysis, excellent oral and written communication skills, comfort with operating and decision-making with imperfect information, a strong work ethic, superb organizational and analysis planning skills, and a knack for pushing projects to completion. The analyst should have a strong grasp of advanced analytics and functions in Excel. Ideal candidate has a business, supply chain and/or purchasing background. Capable candidates who have recently completed their bachelor’s degree will be considered, as well as those with a minimum of 2-4 years of experience in a related role. ', 'Role located at the company’s corporate office in Oakbrook, IL', 'Devise and implement a scalable supply chain management process to optimize inventory levels on an ongoing basis ', 'Bachelor’s degree ', '50% contribution to individual or family health plans offered by company ', 'Primary Duties: ', 'a full-time, highly capable supply chain analyst and buyer ', 'analytical skills', 'Determine appropriate adjustments in inventory levels and stocking programs to meet customer requirements ', 'Compensation & Benefits:', 'Superb project and analysis planning skills ', 'Regularly look at company purchasing patterns and make adjustments based on trends ']

Concentration in Information Technology, Bioinformatics, Biology, Computer Science, Basic Sciences or other relevant healthcare or life sciences field preferred. ', 'Qualifications', '2+ years of direct analytical work experience as a business or applications analyst in a customer facing role, in an academic and/or healthcare setting; clinical research experience a plus. ', 'Understand various software systems and the interdependencies between them to guide treatment arm and calendar creation. ', 'Actively participate in and support team culture. ', 'Utilize Dana-Farber Cancer Institute values to govern decisions, actions and behaviors. ', 'Serve as an exemplary representative of RIO. On-going communication, feedback and follow-through with customers/peers are essential. ', 'Assist with business requirements gathering, workflow analysis, definition and documentation of system requirements for the many clinical research business processes involved for each of the DF/HCC institutions as they relate to the various clinical trial systems, biobanking and basic research systems.', 'OVERVIEW OF RESEARCH INFORMATICS FOR OPERATIONS (RIO) TEAM ', 'Assist with the design and implementation of system and workflow solutions for clinical trials management, electronic data capture, and other systems supported by the Customer Experience Operations team. ', 'Bachelor’s degree required. Concentration in Information Technology, Bioinformatics, Biology, Computer Science, Basic Sciences or other relevant healthcare or life sciences field preferred. 2+ years of direct analytical work experience as a business or applications analyst in a customer facing role, in an academic and/or healthcare setting; clinical research experience a plus. ', 'Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation for resolution of patient care critical issues', 'Attention to detail, customer service orientation, and proven ability to perform work accurately and efficiently.Ability to be flexible, versatile and adaptable in activities conducted in a multi-site environment.Must be willing to contribute to and foster a team culture where all are encouraged and willing to share information accurately.Able to self-manage and assume ownership for support tasks and project work.Demonstrated ability to work independently and within a team.Ability to work and maintain focus within a complex work environment with shifting and competing priorities.Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, working on multiple concurrent, inter-related subprojects.', 'Must be willing to contribute to and foster a team culture where all are encouraged and willing to share information accurately.', 'Incumbent will assist more experienced staff with projects, eventually leading their own projects, including design & implementation of new software systems to support clinical and basic research. Will utilize various vendor and in-house developed systems, including enterprise-wide systems, to meet the changing needs of the scientific and clinical research community. The Business Analyst will also manage, coordinate and support all aspects of the clinical trial treatment arm and calendar creation process. They will work with study teams and other stakeholders to meet clinical trial activation requirements, specimen collection requirements, and patient registration needs utilizing the clinical trial management, as well as biobanking systems. Incumbent will also support day-to-day usage of RIO applications and provide education on system workflows and functionality. The incumbent must be able to create and maintain healthy working relationships with end users, DF/HCC and site leadership.', 'Effectively balance the needs of DF/HCC, various stakeholders, and those of a generic application', 'Learn and utilize new products and tools, as appropriate, to successfully complete work assignments', 'Provide a high level of customer support to DF/HCC stakeholders, including study teams, clinicians, Office of Data Quality, Office for Human Research Studies, Digital Health eCare and others by either resolving issues or facilitating connection with appropriate resources. ', 'Perform other related duties as assigned and/or needed', '\xa0', "Located in Boston and the surrounding communities, Dana-Farber Cancer Institute brings together world renowned clinicians, innovative researchers and dedicated professionals, allies in the common mission of conquering cancer, HIV/AIDS and related diseases. Combining extremely talented people with the best technologies in a genuinely positive environment, we provide compassionate and comprehensive care to patients of all ages; we conduct research that advances treatment; we educate tomorrow's physician/researchers; we reach out to underserved members of our community; and we work with amazing partners, including other Harvard Medical School-affiliated hospitals.", 'Dana-Farber Cancer Institute is an equal opportunity employer and affirms the right of every qualified applicant to receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender identity or expression, national origin, sexual orientation, genetic information, disability, age, ancestry, military service, protected veteran status, or other groups as protected by law.', 'Manage all aspects of the project: team communications, timelines, signoffs, scope changes, etc.', 'Formal business analyst training and/or project management training a plus ', 'Identify obstacles encountered during the build process; communicate and develop acceptable resolutions to such obstacles. ', 'Demonstrated ability to work independently and within a team.', 'Maintain a positive collaboration with the vendor', 'Attention to detail, customer service orientation, and proven ability to perform work accurately and efficiently.', 'Ability to work and maintain focus within a complex work environment with shifting and competing priorities.', 'Experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams of 5 or more indirect resources', 'Ability to be flexible, versatile and adaptable in activities conducted in a multi-site environment.', 'Schedule and run meetings, report progress, track and route issues', 'Experience with successful implementation of enterprise applications a plus', 'Build protocol treatment arms and calendars in the clinical trial management systems.', 'Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, working on multiple concurrent, inter-related subprojects.', 'Provide a high level of customer support to DF/HCC stakeholders, including study teams, clinicians, Office of Data Quality, Office for Human Research Studies, Digital Health eCare and others by either resolving issues or facilitating connection with appropriate resources. ', 'RIO is a subdivision of the DFCI Research Informatics and Analytics department led by the Chief Health Information Officer.\xa0RIO is a significant component of the Clinical Research Support Unit for the DF/HCC consortium and specifically addresses the growing technological needs of the clinical trials research community. Systems supported by RIO interface to site-specific and enterprise-wide systems. The office provides a collaborative, responsive, integrated and focused approach to all aspects of systems development and support. The DF/HCC is comprised of the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute, Massachusetts General Hospital, Brigham and Women’s Hospital, Boston Children’s Hospital, Beth Israel Deaconess Hospital, Harvard Medical School and the Harvard School of Public Health. RIO supports clinical trials research informatics systems for the DF/HCC member institutions with regards to oncology research.', 'Gather, analyze, and assimilate documents required to build calendars, treatment arms.', 'The Research Informatics Operations (RIO) team is looking for an enthusiastic Business Analyst to coordinate and support the information system needs of the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute (DFCI) clinical research community. The Business Analyst will join the Client Services Team, supporting Customer Experience Operations under the RIO umbrella. The mission of the Client Services Team is to support the operations of the clinical trials program at Dana-Farber/Harvard Cancer Center, including but not limited to clinical trial management, grant development, intellectual property management, and biospecimen banking.', 'Adhere to recognized project management tools and methodologies.']

['Is this the role for you? ', 'If you love data, you might love this role. Leveraging marketplace analysis and internal data, you will see past the numbers to identify trends and recommend opportunities for growth. Generate, interpret, and report financial data; create cost projections and analysis relative to current financial developments and trends (while considering multi-year margin, return, and capital needs), and prepare and present to the Board and Management in Asset Liability Committee (ALCO) meetings.', 'As a member of the Leadership Team, the Financial Analyst provides insights, information, ideas, and expertise to support the strategic direction of the credit union. Your analytical abilities will support organizational decisions related to product development, delivery channel, and member growth initiatives and activities. The work you do with quantitative and qualitative analytics will generate insights that support organizational decision making and drive critical outcomes. You can help us realize our mission as we use your analysis in pricing, member relationships, delivery channel decisions, and creating member value. Your consultative approach will help us make the right organizational decision.', 'Let’s get to know each other. ', 'Are we the place for you?', 'To be considered as our Financial Analyst, please submit a letter that describes your passion for data and analytical thinking and tells us what makes Central Willamette Credit Union right for you. Demonstrate your outstanding communication skills by sharing how your career has prepared you for this step and describe your proficiency in data analytics, financial modeling and statistics.', 'Include a resume that shows at least 3 years of experience in analytics in a financial institution, your education (Bachelor’s Degree) in finance, economics, or a related field, and your professional credentials.', 'You will also use your action-oriented insights to support Capital Planning and Stress Testing process and functions, build out forecasting models, and help your team members make data-driven decisions across the Credit Union. Strong organization and planning skills will help you manage multiple projects simultaneously as you work independently and with a team.', 'At Central Willamette Credit Union ($410M in assets; Albany, OR), we are laser-focused on building a stronger financial future for each of our members. We are particularly passionate about making the communities of the Willamette Valley even better places to live, work and play. You will like being on our team if you integrate the core values of Respect, Integrity, Ethics, Compassion and Humor in all that you do and you appreciate partnering with others who embrace change and have a strong desire to serve, to learn, and who love a good laugh.', 'While we don’t take ourselves too seriously, we are incredibly serious about our purpose: To build local loyalty, connect to the community, and make life easier for those we serve. This is why our team members are often out in our communities, giving their time and talents to further our quest of making the world a more just and caring place.', '\xa0']

['', 'Duties And Responsibilities', 'Use Professional Judgment -- Makes logical, rational, and integrative decisions, and arrives at sound conclusions. Chooses the best alternative(s) based on a review of pros, cons, tradeoffs, timing, and probabilities. Evaluates the consequences and implications of alternatives, actions, or decisions (e.g., impact on sales, returns, customer loyalty). Makes timely decisions, balancing analysis with decisiveness.', 'Produce Results -- Initiates decisive, timely action to address important issues. Demonstrates a strong sense of ownership and a commitment to achieving meaningful results. Sets challenging, clear goals/targets and expectations for achieving business results. Drives initiatives/efforts to successful completion and closure. Takes personal responsibility to make decisions and take action.', 'Competencies', 'ith or without a reasonable accommodation.', 'Perform Professional Analysis -- Integrates information from a variety of sources to arrive at a broader understanding of issues (e.g., company reports plus in-store observations). Defines issues clearly despite incomplete or ambiguous information. Identifies the key issues in complex or ambiguous problems. Approaches problems or issues systematically, looking for connections, trends, and potential causes. Probes and looks past symptoms to determine the underlying causes of problems and issues.', 'Work Environment', 'Essential Job Functions', 'Perform Additional Duties As Required.', 'Contacts', 'Impact', 'Supervisory Responsibility', 'The incumbent must be able to perform all of the following duties and responsibilities ', 'Education And Experience', 'Demonstrate Adaptability and Desire to Learn -- Works productively in the face of ambiguity or uncertainty. Demonstrates flexibility and resilience in response to obstacles, constraints, adversity, and mistakes. Constructively and resourcefully adapts to changing needs, conditions, priorities or opportunities. Seeks out opportunities to learn from new discoveries, innovations, ways of looking at things, knowledge, and ideas. Invites and incorporates feedback, without becoming defensive.', 'Satisfy the Customer -- Identifies and anticipates customer requirements, expectations, and needs. Seeks feedback from customers to identify improvement opportunities. Follows up with customers to ensure problems are solved. Continually searches for ways to improve customer service (including the removal of barriers, and providing solutions).', 'Planning and Problem Solving', 'Plan and Execute -- Develops realistic plans (e.g., action steps, timelines) to accomplish objectives. Acquires and leverages resources, processes, and tools to achieve business goals. Prioritizes and balances time, actions, and projects to ensure accomplishment of results. Holds him/herself and team accountable for outcomes (e.g., achieving goals and complying with policies and procedures). Anticipates and addresses obstacles, redirecting efforts to accelerate the work or improve quality.']

job_text: ['', 'About PRG', 'Proven experience gathering and documenting requirements, writing user stories, drawing wireframes, leading grooming sessions for software/web applications is required ', 'PRG’s dedication to service has been widely recognized throughout the industry. PRG has been awarded ClearlyRated’s Best of Staffing award for 5 straight years, as well as the Business Journal’s Best Places to Work in Dallas, San Antonio and Austin.', 'With nearly 20 years of success in the staffing industry, Peyton Resource Group focuses on matching talent to the precise needs of our clients. Your success is our commitment, and we back up that commitment by only recommending opportunities that align with your goals. Our candidate-centric approach ensures you are in the driver’s seat of your career, and our team of recruiters will partner with you and support you every step of the way.', 'SUMMARY:', '3-5+ years of related IT Business Analysis experience working in Agile/Scrum environments ', 'NO REMOTE WORK!', 'Any QA testing skills, a plus', 'Position will be Permanent/Direct Hire; Immediate Need', 'Requires a mix of technical and functional/business skills', 'Strong communication skills (written and verbal) are required', 'Immediate need for an IT Business Analyst to gather & document requirements, create user stories, etc. for custom software development projects.\xa0Position will require onsite work! \xa0\xa0', '3-5+ years of related IT Business Analysis experience working in Agile/Scrum environments Proven experience gathering and documenting requirements, writing user stories, drawing wireframes, leading grooming sessions for software/web applications is required Jira, Confluence or related tools, preferred Any QA testing skills, a plusRequires a mix of technical and functional/business skillsStrong communication skills (written and verbal) are requiredPosition will be Permanent/Direct Hire; Immediate NeedNO REMOTE WORK!', 'Jira, Confluence or related tools, preferred ', '\xa0']
